Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p class=\u0026quot;p2\u0026quot;\u0026gt;At MongoDB, our Account Development team works closely with our partners in both Sales and Marketing to build fanatical customer enthusiasm around MongoDB. At MongoDB, we have a culture that celebrates diversity, fosters growth and enablement, and ensures that we provide our ADRs with the tools and the confidence that they need to grow their careers. We invest heavily in the training and development of our team. You will always have the support from our sales enablement org and managers that will maintain 1:1 coaching throughout your career here.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p class=\u0026quot;p2\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Our ADRs gain an understanding of our product, community, who we sell to, why they care, and what makes us relevant. We invest heavily in the training and development of our team. You will always have the support from our sales enablement org and managers that will maintain 1:1 coaching throughout your career here.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our ADRs gain an understanding of our product, community, who we sell to, why they care, and what makes us relevant. They learn how to generate a pipeline quickly and effectively as well as how to achieve a good discovery and qualification. Dutch Speaking","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $137.6 billion by 2027!\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;). \u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt; \u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;At MongoDB, our Account Development team works closely with our partners in both Sales and Marketing to build fanatical customer enthusiasm around MongoDB. ADR reps are responsible for identifying and qualifying new opportunities for our sales organization.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;We view our Account Development program as the best way to turbocharge a long and successful career in sales and view our Account Development Representatives (ADRs) as the next wave of Account Executives at MongoDB.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our Berlin, Dublin or Barcelona offices with a hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The Opportunity\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Being an ADR is often a first step to jump-starting a career in sales. At MongoDB, we have a culture that celebrates diversity, fosters growth and enablement, and ensures that we provide our ADRs with the tools and the confidence that they need to grow their careers. We invest heavily in the training and development of our team. You will always have the support from our sales enablement org and managers that will maintain 1:1 coaching throughout your career here.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Our ADRs gain an understanding of our product, community, who we sell to, why they care, and what makes us relevant. They learn how to generate a pipeline quickly and effectively as well as how to achieve a good discovery and qualification. The team is a crucial resource for sales teams across MongoDB to get great talent from. This helps us scale our teams, as well as ensure that we have a culture of meritocracy.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: French Speaking","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $137.6 billion by 2027!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;At MongoDB, our Account Development team works closely with our partners in both Sales and Marketing to build fanatical customer enthusiasm around MongoDB. ADR reps are responsible for identifying and qualifying new opportunities for our sales organization.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We view our Account Development program as the best way to turbocharge a long and successful career in sales and view our Account Development Representatives (ADRs) as the next wave of Account Executives at MongoDB.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our Dublin or Barcelona office for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;The Opportunity\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Being an ADR is often a first step to jump-starting a career in sales. At MongoDB, we have a culture that celebrates diversity, fosters growth and enablement, and ensures that we provide our ADRs with the tools and the confidence that they need to grow their careers. We invest heavily in the training and development of our team. You will always have the support from our sales enablement org and managers that will maintain 1:1 coaching throughout your career here.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our ADRs gain an understanding of our product, community, who we sell to, why they care, and what makes us relevant. They learn how to generate a pipeline quickly and effectively as well as how to achieve a good discovery and qualification. The team is a crucial resource for sales teams across MongoDB to get great talent from. This helps us scale our teams, as well as ensure that we have a culture of meritocracy.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Day to region\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with the Sales team to develop and lead inbound and outbound campaigns from idea-generation through to qualified business\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Invest in your self-development, focusing on the skills and attributes that will make you successful in your core role and get you set for future success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What You Will Bring to the At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;At MongoDB, our Account Development team works closely with our partners in both Sales and Marketing to build fanatical customer enthusiasm around MongoDB. ADR reps are responsible for identifying and qualifying new opportunities for our sales organization.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;We view our Account Development program as the best way to turbocharge a long and successful career in sales and view our Account Development Representatives (ADRs) as the next wave of Account Executives at MongoDB.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our Berlin office for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The Opportunity\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Being an ADR is often a first step to jump-starting a career in sales. At MongoDB, we have a culture that celebrates diversity, fosters growth and enablement, and ensures that we provide our ADRs with the tools and the confidence that they need to grow their careers. We invest heavily in the training and development of our team. You will always have the support from our sales enablement org and managers that will maintain 1:1 coaching throughout your career here.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Our ADRs gain an understanding of our product, community, who we sell to, why they care, and what makes us relevant. They learn how to generate a pipeline quickly and effectively as well as how to achieve a good discovery and qualification. The team is a crucial resource for sales teams across MongoDB to get great talent from. This helps us scale our teams, as well as ensure that we have a culture of meritocracy.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: ADR reps are responsible for identifying and qualifying new opportunities for our sales organization.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We view our Account Development program as the best way to turbocharge a long and successful career in sales and view our Account Development Representatives (ADRs) as the next wave of Account Executives at MongoDB.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our Dublin or Barcelona office for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The Opportunity\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Being an ADR is often a first step to jump-starting a career in sales. At MongoDB, we have a culture that celebrates diversity, fosters growth and enablement, and ensures that we provide our ADRs with the tools and the confidence that they need to grow their careers. We invest heavily in the training and development of our team. You will always have the support from our sales enablement org and managers that will maintain 1:1 coaching throughout your career here.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our ADRs gain an understanding of our product, community, who we sell to, why they care, and what makes us relevant. They learn how to generate a pipeline quickly and effectively as well as how to achieve a good discovery and qualification. The team is a crucial resource for sales teams across MongoDB to get great talent from. The Acquisition Account Executive role focuses exclusively on formulating and executing a sales strategy within an assigned territory, resulting in revenue growth and new customer acquisition.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;About the Sales Culture\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is always developing and innovating — not only in our technology, but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Bengaluru for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you’ll be doing\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively prospect, identify, qualify and objectives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in our sales programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you will bring to the table\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;B.E./B.Tech As an Administrative Coordinator, you provide administrative support but you do not support a dedicated person in a specific location. You will be assigned executives on an as needed basis, to fill vacancies created by vacations, sick days, leaves of absence, or vacant positions that are posted or being recruited.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Your day will consist of managing and prioritizing a steady stream of requests, such as calendar management, booking travel accommodations, or completing expenses. You will need to have an ability to build relationships quickly, and adapt to different working styles. You should feel comfortable interacting with high-level executives and operating in a fast-paced environment. team.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Responsibilities:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Assist other Executive Assistants support Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;About the role\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re looking for a hardworking, driven individual with superb energy, passion and initiative for new business acquisition. The Associate Account Executives will focus on planning and executing on a sales strategy within MongoDB’s most strategic accounts cohesively with the Strategic Account Director and other internal departments, resulting in revenue growth. Our Inside Sales organization offers an incredible opportunity to grow into an Enterprise Account Executive within 12 to 24 months.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We value high aptitude and positive outlook over experience, so if you feel like you are the right fit for this dynamic team, please contact us!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;About the Sales Culture\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is always developing and innovating — not only in our technology, but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “Think Big and Go Far.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you will be doing\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively, identify, qualify and build a sales pipeline within MongoDB’s most Strategic Accounts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with the Strategic Account Director to develop prospecting campaigns from idea-generation through to qualified opportunity and close\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strategically prospect into CTOs, Engineering/IT Leaders, \u0026amp;amp; technical end users\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the enterprise ecosystem Solution Architects, Marketing, Partners, CSM, Professional Services to maximize customer value\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Invest in your self-development, focusing on the skills and attributes that will make you successful in your core role and set you up for future success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you will bring to the table\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;2 to 3 years B2B sales experience including time spent in a closing role, strong preference for software sales\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A proven track record of overachievement through generating your own pipeline and hitting sales targets.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Energetic, upbeat, entrepreneurial, tenacious teammate. Possess a strong desire to be successful.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent verbal and written communication skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience using Salesforce.com\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Passionate about growing your career in the largest and fastest growing market in software (database) and developing and maintaining an in-depth understanding of MongoDB products\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with database, SaaS, cloud, and open source technology a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What we will bring to the table\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;MongoDB invests 8x the industry average in the development \u0026amp;amp; continuous career progression of each of our new hires\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Best-in-breed Sales trainings in MEDDPICC and Command of the Message, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamps and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Internal mentor and buddy program cross-departmentally\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Clear and defined career path BDR to CRO; Empowering Salespeople to own their career path\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Uncapped commissions, attractive accelerators, and bonus package\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;New hire stock equity (RSUs) and employee stock purchase plan\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Friendly and inclusive workplace culture - At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Individuals in the Associate Customer Success Manager role have a passion for technology and the ambition to dive head-first into new challenges. This is a relatively new role at MongoDB, so we are looking for someone who can thrive with a high level of ambiguity and operate with a high amount of autonomy while maintaining a customer centric approach and helping to build the program.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;In this role you will work as the primary point of contact for MongoDB end users across a portfolio of 40-50 rapidly growing MongoDB Atlas customers. You will be responsible for acting as the account team leader bringing together Sales, Professional Services, Technical Services, etc. to drive positive outcomes for our customers.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Our ideal candidate will have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;2+ years experience working in a Customer Success, Account Management, Client Services or other similarly customer-centric role.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A background and passion for driving growth within a customer portfolio through enablement sessions, strategy meetings, business reviews, etc.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A mind for technology - we’ll teach you about MongoDB and databases, but our customers and product are inherently technical and you should have an aptitude and curiosity to learn about those concepts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to act with a high level of autonomy, you will be expected to take full ownership of your customer portfolio and make key decisions to drive effective customer outcomes; including deciding when to include our executive team or c-suite in customer escalations, how to de-risk or de-escalate customer issues and conflict, and advocating to internal teams including sales, professional services, etc.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;An entrepreneurial mindset - this is a new team at MongoDB where you will be required to both deviate from established procedure and use data-driven analysis to build new process or practices that enhance our service of this customer segment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Team player and passion for collaboration - this role will work with some of our most strategic growth customers so must align closely to Sales, Professional Services, Tech Services, and the broader MDB ecosystem\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior exposure to database, cloud, and infrastructure technology is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;For Austin: Bilingual Spanish or Portuguese is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;For EMEA: Bilingual is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;On a given day in this role you will\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work as a strategic advisor to your customer providing them with guidance on MongoDB best practices and their overall technology strategy; this could include running enablement sessions alone or with another internal MongoDB team members, advising the customer on strategies to optimize their technical environment or current spend with MongoDB, positioning and recommending product features and best practices to accelerate customers time to value and growth\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collect feedback and identify roadblocks from customers to inform internal teams including Product, Professional Services, and Leadership on how MongoDB can build a stronger product and go to market organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Act as the link between our customers and product engineering to develop new innovative solutions. You will be key in building the future roadmap of our product by acting as the Product team’s eyes and ears in this field\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;De-escalate and resolve critical customer issues and complaints by finding the best possible solution for both the customer and MongoDB; this could include anything from navigating a customer outage that has a financial impact on their business, to helping an application team devise a custom MongoDB solution or implementation for their critical application, no day is the same\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build and execute account plans to mitigate risk and drive growth 3+ quarters out across your portfolio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead in-person executive business reviews for strategic customers in your portfolio, including interfacing with C-suite executives and other technical leaders to align to business objectives and agree to a mutual success plan\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work on strategic internal projects to help build the Customer Success program; our expectation is that anyone in this role has strong business acumen and the ability to create and teach best practices, new process, and enablement to the broader organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Document all customer interactions in internal systems, including Gainsight and Salesforce.com\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide feedback and guidance to leadership on key signals within MongoDB Atlas that indicate healthy or unhealthy customer accounts; as our product evolves, we’ll need to be constantly adjusting our engagement strategies based on these signals, which you’ll be in the best position to identify and share back with internal teams\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Manage the relationship with Sales Leadership and Account Executives in your territory, including reporting on business performance, training on best practices, and rolling out program updates to ensure sales people and leaders are abreast of best practices for interacting with Customer Success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for an Associate Partner Programs Lead to join our Cloud Partner team and drive business growth. We are looking for a creative business development professional with extraordinary energy, passion to learn, and initiative to drive channel programs for the fastest-growing database in the world, MongoDB. The Associate Partner Programs Lead role will own multiple GTM workstreams with one of MongoDB’s strategic hyperscaler partners. This individual will be accountable for developing new processes and refining existing ones to support incremental pipeline, increase sales productivity, improve co-sell execution, and launch new sales plays with the Cloud provider.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The individual will be required to work on global programs, so should be flexible to work across different time zones when required.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Take ownership and run sales programs to support our global sales teams\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build and execute global GTM\u0026amp;nbsp; (co-selling, co-marketing, product alignment) programs with the Cloud co-sell team, with a reporting line to RVP, WW Partner Programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Liaison with internal teams (Product Management, Legal, Revenue, Finance, etc.) to launch new solutions, initiatives, and sales plays\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify new field enablement activities to deliver an enhanced user experience so selling is made easier and deals are closed quicker\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead day-to-day operations of the allocated Marketplaces and execute new initiatives to improve the effectiveness of the channel\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prepare and deliver business reviews to MongoDB’s \u0026amp;amp; Cloud provider’s senior sales and partner leaders\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Interlock with extended Partner team - Cloud/Hybrid Specialists, Partner Marketing, Partner Architect Team - for backup and support\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Requirements\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Business acumen, with a demonstrated track record of driving owning and driving programs within an emerging/disruptive technologies company\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years of experience in fast paced enterprise technology\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;1-3 years in either a BDR, sales or partner development role with an Enterprise Software company\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Preferably have Program Management skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior experience of working in a heavy sales matrix model is preferred\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior experience in working with AWS/Azure/GCP (expecially Marketplaces) is preferred\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Technically knowledgeable in the enterprise software, databse and cloud computing space if preferred\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. To fuel this growth, we are hiring a Process Automation Analyst to proactively maintain customer and prospect data. Tired of executing existing SOPs manually, here is your chance to Think Big, Go Far with this exciting Role:\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt; Associate II Process Automation under Data Strategy and Insights team of larger Sales Operations Team\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt; \u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;and is responsible for ensuring that organization has access to high-quality information required to make data-driven decisions.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Shift Timings: 2pm-10pm. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;em\u0026gt;Click here to learn more about our \u0026lt;/em\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://app.guide.co/p/a85fd0b5-69c8-409c-a955-334ec70defd3\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;em\u0026gt;Technical Services team.\u0026lt;/em\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys. Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB, and help us make an impact on the world!\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;About the team\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Technical Services Engineers use their outstanding problem solving and customer service skills, along with their deep technical experience, to advise customers and to solve their complex MongoDB problems. Technical Service Engineers are specialists in the entire MongoDB ecosystem - database server, drivers, our management suite, as well as services such as \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://cloud.mongodb.com/\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Atlas\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, Cloud Manager, Compass to name a few. Our engineers combine their MongoDB expertise with passion, initiative, teamwork, and a great sense of humor to achieve exceptional results for our customers. We’re looking for individuals who want to dig into the details of how “big data” and “web-scale” systems are successfully assembled and operated every day by organizations of every size and flavor.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Bengaluru for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Why MongoDB is a fantastic place to work and build your career\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be a part of the company that’s reinventing the database, passionate about innovation and speed\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Enjoy a fun, inspiring culture that is engineering focused\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with exceptionally talented people around the globe\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Learn, contribute, and make an impact on the product and community\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Cool things you’ll do\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is on a mission to change the way people think about databases. Along the way, our customers encounter questions and issues about how our approach to databases works for their use case. In Technical Services, it\u0026#39;s our job to help these people.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;You\u0026#39;ll be working alongside our largest customers, solving their complex issues - resolving questions on architecture, performance, recovery, security, and everything in between. You’ll be providing an unparalleled customer experience by advising customers on strategies and documented practices for making best use of our products.\u0026amp;nbsp; You\u0026#39;ll be an authority on best practices in running MongoDB at scale, whatever that scale may be. You\u0026#39;ll be an advocate for customers\u0026#39; needs - working with our product management and development teams on their behalf. And you\u0026#39;ll contribute to internal projects, including software development of support tools for performance, benchmarking, and diagnostics.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What You Need/What we are looking for\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;While our ideal candidate will have a 3-5 years of proven technical experience, we consider all candidates with an eye for those who are self-driven, insatiably curious, and multi-faceted.\u0026amp;nbsp; It’s crucial that every candidate possess the following skills to effectively perform the type of investigative and diagnostic work expected of Technical Services Engineers\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Overwhelming desire to investigate and solve problems, with advanced diagnostic and troubleshooting skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Broad awareness of customer workloads and use cases, including performance, availability, and scalability\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience analyzing issues holistically, from the application tier through the database, down to the storage\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to think on your feet, remain calm under pressure, and solve problems in real-time\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Comfortable working on the command line, in the GUI, and everywhere in between.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Patience, empathy and genuine desire to help people\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Desire and ability to rapidly learn a wide variety of new technical skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaboration: willingness and ability to get help from team members when required, and the good judgment to know when to seek help\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Your professional or self-taught experiences should have provided you with a strong understanding and grasp of three or more of the following areas\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Application Architecture\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Systems Administration - OS, Networking, Diagnostics\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Network Administration\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Development, automation, or hardware\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior knowledge of either AWS or another Cloud Provider platform\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fundamental understanding of relational OR non-relational database systems, including administration and troubleshooting\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;If you have an operations background, we prefer experience administering large-scale production environments, including hardware, operating systems (e.g. Linux, Windows), Networks (including firewalls and load balancers), as well as cloud-based resources (e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Systems engineering experience, including Linux performance, memory management, I/O tuning, configuration, security, networking, clusters, and troubleshooting\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Bonus Points\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience using or managing MongoDB or other database solutions (RDBMS or NoSQL)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience using any cloud services stack such as AWS, Azure or GCP\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Technical writing and/or training\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Foreign language skills, a MongoDB or Cloud Certification, or previous support experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Systems engineering experience, including Linux performance, memory management, I/O tuning, configuration, security, networking, clusters, and troubleshooting\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Understanding of Networking concepts and protocols (DNS, TCP/IP, SSL/TLS, etc.)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience coding or scripting in one or more of JavaScript, Python, Bash, Ruby, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, Go, Node.js, Perl\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 3 months, you’ll have gained a deep understanding of MongoDB and its ecosystem. You will complete New Hire Training\u0026amp;nbsp; and begin taking cases alongside your peers and coaches.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 6 months, you will be comfortable working frontline with our customers. You will also complete the MongoDB Certified DBA Associate exam\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 12 months, you will be a technical specialist within MongoDB and will be helping your peer engineers in advanced diagnostics. Also, you will be encouraged to handle technical escalations independently\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To find out more about what it’s like to be a Technical Services Engineer at MongoDB, check out this\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/technical-services-engineering-at-mongo-db-meet-alex-bevilacqua\u0026quot;\u0026gt; link\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Building on the rapid success and adoption of MongoDB, we are delivering applications and services that make it much easier to manger and scale database deployments. These next-generation systems are a growing list but currently include products such as Atlas, Cloud Manager, Compass, eta to name a few.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Palo Alto, CA for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Cool things you\u0026#39;ll do\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Associate Technical Support Engineer- Cloud will be part of the front line of our cloud support team, directly responding to questions from our customers on areas such as connectivity, the availability of the Atlas service and questions about the UI or platform features. You will also be working with our engineering teams to escalate more complex customer problems. It\u0026#39;s crucial that you ensure that questions are answered quickly and accurately and that our customer get the help they need, regardless of who provides the answers in the end.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our Cloud Triage team combines their MongoDB expertise with passion, initiative, teamwork, and a great sense of humor to help our customers to be successful with MongoDB around the globe.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you\u0026#39;re passionate about the opportunity to get comfortable working with the cloud every single day and be part of a team that works at the frontier of SaaS services and database systems, this is the role for you.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Associate Technical Support Engineers will be successful in this role when they can execute the following strategic tasks/responsibilities:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Customer Service: Provide an unparalleled customer experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide valuable product and user feedback to our sales, engineering, and marketing staff\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Review and test new features before they are publicly available.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What We’re Looking For\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our Cloud Triage team has a general knowledge of operating systems (Linux, UNIX, windows), networking, databases, and general computing. In order to hit the ground running it would be preferable if you had proficiency in one or more of the following areas:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Databases and administration (relational or non-relational)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Networking basics\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Programming and APIs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The right candidate for this role will have experience with live text chat, technical or non-technical, and be comfortable dealing with customer support questions of various levels of difficulty.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;You’ll need to genuinely enjoy helping others, and be good at interpreting their requests. It’s helpful if you have also worked in a support role before, but not required. You will be the first person to have a human connection with our customers and will be chatting with them in real time as they have questions or technical issues. Awareness of tone, clarity of communication, and collaborative spirit is required.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;You’ll get bonus points for foreign language skills or previous support experience.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Why MongoDB is a fantastic place to work and build your career\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be a part of the company that is reinventing the database, focused on innovation and speed\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Enjoy a fun, inspiring culture that is engineering focused\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with talented people around the globe\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Learn, contribute, and make an impact on the product and community\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As a Technical BSA/ Product Owner, you will define the vision and future of our Salesforce environment. TechOps sits at the intersection of every business unit and delivers mission critical services and information to Stakeholders across the entire company.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Bengaluru or Gurugram for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The right candidate for this role will\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be a CRM subject matter expert with a specialization in all things Salesforce, including CPQ, FinancialForce, and Sales cloud\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be able to deep dive on and understand the journeys taken by different types of users\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Have a high level ability to think through a solution and determine how much would be the effort or lift in order to use the information for planning purpose\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to figure out high level complexity involved in the project and bring together right point of contacts essential to make the implementation all rounded\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Able to independently identify areas of improvement and advocate for it\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Have strong willingness to help the customers that are facing problems, follow through and take it to completion\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Extensive experience creating business requirement documents (BRD), functional requirements, \u0026amp;amp; accurately translating business Requirements into system functionality requirements. Work with the CRM team to groom user stories such as clarifying or augmenting user story acceptance criteria, points, etc\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Hands on configuration of Salesforce Platform including security, automation, approval processes, visual flow, custom objects, etc\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with Professional Services, Support Ops, Customer Success Managers, Deal Desk, and\u0026amp;nbsp; Finance teams to understand their goals and help define system solutions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Marry understanding of business with systems expertise to provide input to strategic technical roadmaps as well as proactively identify and address delivery needs based on roadmap\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Orchestrate end-to-end solutions by taking into account integration(s) needed amongst varied best-of-breed applications that come into play throughout a transaction’s lifecycle\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Seek out ways to utilize SFDC to improve processes and productivity, and make recommendations to support an organization scaling at a rapid pace\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work together with Technical staff to develop integration and migration requirements and custom extensions or functionality to existing business applications when needed\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with stakeholders in user acceptance testing CRM systems as well as , demos, and the user training\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Have an understanding of how to prioritize work, make trade-offs and re-prioritize based on new information\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Knowledgeable of and experienced with working in Agile/Scrum environments\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Guide Stakeholders and Developers to the right product decisions to create a stable, scalable and growth oriented Salesforce platform that will serve diverse departmental needs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Gather requirements from various Stakeholders, evaluate the requirements and partner with the Business Systems Analysts for delivery of projects\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Communicate complex technical issues simply and effectively to a wide range of audiences from engineers to executives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Facilitate communication with other MongoDB teams to ensure that all roadmaps and deliverables are aligned\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build and maintain the roadmap for Salesforce\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Establish strong partnerships with stakeholders\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Maintain and update a well organized and prioritized backlog\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 3 months you’ll have fully ramped within your teams, and created a short term roadmap and drive to completion\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 6 months you’ll have taken complete ownership of the product and generated a long term road map\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 12 months you’ll have delivered multiple projects and defined the future of Salesforce at MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. Staff, Sales","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $136 billion by 2027!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are hiring a Chief of Staff to support the CRO and the wider sales organization. This is a critical role, as this person is responsible for designing and executing strategic initiatives and operational programs in close partnership with the CRO and other functional leaders across the company.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Specifically the responsibilities are:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Serving as strategic advisor and counsel to the CRO\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Enabling the success of leadership teams and the sales force as a whole\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Assuming day-to-day responsibility for projects and tasks\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Creating and maintaining cross-departmental relationships to enable leadership success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This person will be expected to work end-to-end on projects that include a broad range of operational decisions and initiatives, growth strategies, sales enablement initiatives, and driving executive communications with internal and external stakeholders.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Consequently, this is a unique opportunity as this role will give this person direct exposure to the CRO, global sales leaders and the wider executive team, and contribute to the company’s overall strategy and help drive its successful execution.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for a Chief of Staff who is a strategic thinker, an effective influencer, has some degree of technical acumen and the ability to deeply understand our business and rapidly demonstrate impact and value to the organization. The ideal candidate has a combination of strategy, sales and technology market experience and is able to thrive in high growth, fast-paced environments dealing with ambiguous and often complex problems. Excellent writing skills in English are required.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Candidate Profile\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5+ years of sales strategy, sales operations, or management consulting experience preferred\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Tech industry experience and leadership experience desirable (ideally B2B software)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong in analytics, critical thinking, and reasoned judgment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Great relationship builder and able to connect with people reporting into the CRO and others across the organization to influence outcomes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Team player who can work with individuals from different backgrounds across the entire organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong communicator (spoken and written)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Expands a team’s bandwidth by integrating themselves quickly and assessing issues that serve as barriers to operating at maximum effectiveness\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to make sound decisions in a fast-paced, changing environment with limited data\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrates a high level of accountability married with a huge sense of urgency\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to work independently with limited guidance and support\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Incredibly well organized\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Atlas is the premier multi-cloud database-as-a-service built and operated by the makers of MongoDB. The Cloud Operations Engineering team at MongoDB is a worldwide team responsible for the consistent operational success of every MongoDB Atlas customer. As a Cloud Operations Engineer, you will help ensure the success of our Atlas customers, whether they are early startups or large multinational companies, cloud-native or just getting started with a digital transformation to the cloud. You are excited about the core mission of MongoDB, and the opportunity to join the team responsible for operating Atlas, the fastest-growing multi-cloud database-as-a-service in the world. You are prepared to be one of the early members of a 24/7/365 global cloud operations team.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Cloud Operations Engineers will be responsible for day-to-day duties such as creating and monitoring system’s alert dashboards, reviewing critical events and system logs, accessing customer instances that underpin their production databases and performing server administration duties including performance troubleshooting. Applicants must be critical thinkers who are quick to detect, resolve, or escalate issues that are sometimes broad in scope and difficult to trace.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;At MongoDB you will grow your career and skills, wear multiple hats, and be part of an operations team that works at the frontier of Cloud services and database systems.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This is a hybrid role that will require to be 3 days a week in our Dublin office.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Successfully coordinate and collaborate with a global team of Cloud Operations Engineers who are tasked with ensuring our uptime guarantees to our Atlas customer base\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help scale the worldwide Cloud Operations Engineering team with the strategic implementation and refinement of new processes and tools\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Assist in scoping, designing and deploying systems that reduce Mean Time to Resolve for customer incidents\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Monitor and detect emerging customer-facing incidents on the Atlas platform; assist in their proactive resolution\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Automate routine monitoring and troubleshooting tasks\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Diagnose live incidents, differentiate between platform issues versus usage issues, and take the next steps toward resolution\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Assist in performing root cause analysis after incident recovered; identifying any breakdowns in processes or workflows that contributed to the event and what changes need to be made to prevent similar events\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Contribute to documentation of corner case scenarios, troubleshooting workflows and SOPs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work alongside our product management, cloud engineering and support organizations by identifying areas for improvement in the management applications powering the Atlas infrastructure\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Inform executive leadership and escalation management personnel of major outages\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Coordinate and participate in a weekly on-call rotation, where you will handle short term customer incidents (proactively from automated monitoring or through reactive alerts via our Technical Services team)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Requirements\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with being an on call DevOps, SRE, or Cloud Operations engineer (at least 5 years)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Expertise with Linux system administration, configuration, troubleshooting\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience in monitoring, system performance data collection and analysis, and reporting\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Knowledge interest in learning new things\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Nice To At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is seeking a Salesforce support Admin for CRM Support team who is a proactive individual that can help us continually improve and enhance our Salesforce platform, gathering requirements and feedback, designing scalable best practice solutions, and managing the product road map. The Salesforce Administrator should enjoy all aspects of user management including support tickets, training, and designing solutions with user satisfaction a priority.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for someone with a good understanding of the Salesforce platform, who can understand both our current setup and our business objectives, in order to quickly identify areas of improvement. The Salesforce Administrator should be comfortable with change management and governance, as well as communicating, prioritizing and managing all aspects of a Salesforce project. The ideal candidate will be liaising with stakeholders at all levels, with the ability to communicate technical information into layman’s terms, clearly explaining design/logic options and their potential impact.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with salesforce.com standard objects like Accounts, Opportunity, Products Opportunity Line Items, Contacts, Leads, Campaigns, Activities,Reports and Dashboards\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Set up continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines primarily for Salesforce integrated projects\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ensure all Salesforce updates move from development through staging to production seamlessly through automation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Setting up, monitoring and improving DevOps processes: CI/CD, \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.salesforceben.com/test-automation-salesforce-matter/\u0026quot;\u0026gt;test automation\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, monitoring\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Running data deployments (\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.salesforceben.com/salesforce-sandbox-seeding-challenges-populate-sandboxes-with-data-for-testing/\u0026quot;\u0026gt;sandbox seeding\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;) to test features.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Running final releases to production and rolling back or restoring if anything goes wrong\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Implement solutions for ongoing/new DevOps requirements through geographically dispersed teams\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Environment provisioning, sandbox management, data management\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with Developers, Product Managers, QE, and Support Teams to support ongoing environment, code move, release management process\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify opportunities to automate recurring activities and identifying long-term options, such as self-service\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Champion the mindset of DevOps and Agile within the team to achieve business benefits including faster time to market, faster ROI, predictable release cadence, optimized delivery times, cost optimization, risk reduction\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In addition to being a senior contributor, also provide technical leadership and guidance for the DevOps team\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Act as escalation point and be available to support weekend releases as needed\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Responsible for maintaining CRM systems including updates, enhancements, building reports, managing dashboards, workflows and security\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Effectively communicate and build rapport with team members, stakeholders and business partners using a variety of techniques and collaboration from initiation to close. processes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrated ability to react quickly, lead and perform exceptionally during critical events\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Seek out ways to utilize SFDC to improve processes and productivity, and make recommendations to support an organization scaling at a rapid pace\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Qualifications:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Bachelor\u0026#39;s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Equipped with 5+ years of Salesforce administration, release management, or developer experience\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Able to read, interpret and write Apex, SQL/SOQL/SAQL code\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experienced within Salesforce Service Cloud (Certified Administrator, Certified Developer)\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Able to design processes that are efficient and solutions that are scalable\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;An excellent written and verbal communicator with the ability to learn quickly\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A results-oriented, highly organized individual who can handle multiple competing priorities in a fast-paced, agile environment\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Coming from a technical background in Development/Sysadmin/Automation (a must!)\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experienced in the following: Languages (Apex), Database Technologies (SQL, SOQL), Scripting (Shell, batch), SF Deployment (SFDX, Change sets, SF Metadata API), Version control tools (Git, Bitbucket), Build Automation tools (AutoRabit, Bamboo, Jenkins, Maven, Apache Ant), Project tracking tools (Jira), Additional Skills (Experience in any programming language (Python, Java), test automation, AWS cloud, Code coverage, Unit testing)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Sales Cloud, Integration with third party API, Lightning Development LWC and Aura\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Good understanding of Change/Incident Management (Preferably JIRA/Service Now) and monitor daily business operations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3-6 years of experience working as L1/L2 support professional managing 24/7 Customer facing applications for an enterprise organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Functional knowledge of Salesforce.com and understanding of how to leverage the tool to meet complex process and reporting requirements\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with Salesforce Administration and Configuration like Object Management, Flows, Approval Processes, User Management, Data and Application Security Management.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Development experience in Visualforce, APEX programming, Force.com APIs, SOQLs, Governor Limits, Declarative Automation, Web Services and Lightning components development (Aura and LWC)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Previous experience working in a SCRUM or agile environment is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience integrating Salesforce with other applications (Informatica Cloud/Dell Bhoomi/Mulesoft)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A proactive attitude and demonstrates continued personal/professional development\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience in deployment, versioning, Devops tools preferably Gearset\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Individuals in the Customer Success Manager role have a passion for technology and the ambition to dive head-first into new challenges. This is a relatively new role at MongoDB, so we are looking for someone who can thrive with a high level of ambiguity and operate autonomously while maintaining a customer centric approach and helping to build the program. In this role you will also become a main\u0026amp;nbsp; point of contact for MongoDB end users by leveraging your technical and account management skills as well as acting as the account team leader across Sales, Professional Services, Solutions Architects, etc.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Our ideal candidate will have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;6+ years experience working in a Customer Success, Account Management, Client Services or other similarly customer-centric role\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A background and passion for advocating on behalf of your customers - this role should act as an extension of our customers team within MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A mind for technology - we’ll teach you about MongoDB and databases, but our customers and product are inherently technical and you should have an aptitude and curiosity to learn about those concepts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to act with a high level of autonomy, you will be expected to take full ownership of your customer portfolio and make key decisions to drive effective customer outcomes; including deciding when to include our executive team or c-suite in customer escalations, how to de-risk or de-escalate customer issues and conflict and advocating to internal teams including sales, professional services, etc\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;An entrepreneurial mindset - this is a new team at MongoDB where you will be required to both deviate from established procedure and often build entirely new process or practices to ensure we best serve this customer segment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Team player and passion for collaboration - this role will work with some of our most strategic growth customers so must align closely to Sales, Professional Services, Tech Services, and the broader MDB ecosystem\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior exposure to database, cloud, and infrastructure technology is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;On a given day in this role you will\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work as a strategic advisor to your customer providing them with guidance on MongoDB best practices and their overall technology strategy; this could include running enablement sessions alone or with another internal MongoDB team members, advising the customer on strategies to optimize their technical environment or current spend with MongoDB, positioning and recommending product features and best practices to accelerate customers time to value and growth\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collect feedback and identify roadblocks from customers to inform internal teams including Product, Professional Services, and Leadership on how MongoDB can build a stronger product and go to market organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Act as the link between our customers and product engineering to develop new innovative solutions. You will be key in building the future roadmap of our product by acting as the Product team’s eyes and ears in this field\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;De-escalate and resolve critical customer issues and complaints by finding the best possible solution for both the customer and MongoDB; this could include anything from navigating a customer outage that has a financial impact on their business, to helping an application team devise a custom MongoDB solution or implementation for their critical application, no day is the same\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build and execute account plans to mitigate risk and drive growth 3+ quarters out across your portfolio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead in-person executive business reviews for strategic customers in your portfolio, including interfacing with C-suite executives and other technical leaders to align to business objectives and agree to a mutual success plan\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work on strategic internal projects to help build the Customer Success program; our expectation is that anyone in this role has strong business acumen and the ability to create and teach best practices, new process, and enablement to the broader organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Document all customer interactions in internal systems, including Gainsight and Salesforce.com\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide feedback and guidance to leadership on key signals within MongoDB Atlas that indicate healthy or unhealthy customer accounts; as our product evolves, we’ll need to be constantly adjusting our engagement strategies based on these signals, which you’ll be in the best position to identify and share back with internal teams\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Manage the relationship with Sales Leadership and Account Executives in your territory, including reporting on business performance, training on best practices, and rolling out program updates to ensure sales people and leaders are abreast of best practices for interacting with Customer Success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Forecast expected churn and growth to your senior leadership team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help interview, onboard and ramp new team members - as a more senior team member you will have an immediate role in who joins the team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Act as a leader amongst your peers, running enablement sessions, product certifications and being vocal in team meetings to ensure those around you grow\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. German speaking","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $136 billion by 2027!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $138 billion by 2026!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for a motivated, hardworking and hands-on Customer Success Manager (CSM) to help our customers realize and improve the value of their MongoDB subscription and services.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Individuals in this role have a passion for technology and the ambition to dive head-first into new challenges with some of our largest global customers; are adaptive and excited to help innovate with new processes and contribute to what’s already been built. We’re looking for someone who thrives by having daily interactions with customers who are innovating with one of the most mission-critical pieces of software in any tech stack.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Customer Success team at MongoDB is responsible for establishing relationships and becoming a trusted advisor and “go-to” person for best practices, and to help remove roadblocks or challenges for customers. We are an integral part of our customer’s success with MongoDB and bring value to every interaction - from onboarding and product adoption to growth. This role will report to the Regional Manager, Customer Success.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Our ideal candidate will have\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proven experience working in a Customer Success, Account Management, or similar customer-focused role\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with large-scale, technologically sophisticated, Enterprise-scale customers in a fast paced SaaS environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A mind for technology! We’ll teach you all about MongoDB and databases, but our customers and product are inherently technical and you should have an aptitude and curiosity to learn about those concepts and how you can position product value to our customers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior exposure to database, cloud and infrastructure technology is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;High levels of organization in your workflows - you understand what it means to be responsible for a strategic customer portfolio and to prioritize your time across all of your customers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A passion for partnership and collaboration! You’ll be working with multiple teams on a regular basis (Sales, Marketing, Support, Product, Professional Services) and will help to build the CS “brand” across our entire organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Outstanding verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present to technical and business stakeholders, both internally and externally\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proficiency in German language skills is required for this role\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build meaningful and strategic relationships with customers across various stakeholders, working closely with other MongoDB partners\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead customer and project onboarding experience, validating and identifying customer needs, potential challenges, and key project timelines to ensure we’re meeting expectations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Promote and encourage implementation of paid MongoDB features across your assigned customer portfolio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively and early identify and mitigate risk of churn\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ensure high customer satisfaction and referenceability\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help to develop and implement standard methodologies, processes, and tools to continually improve MongoDB’s Customer Success Program\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;A successful CSM will have the following skills\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Risk Mitigator - identifying technical or business blockers to success for customers and proactively mitigate them by rallying the necessary resources\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Personal Trusted Advisor - recommending standard and advanced methodologies in order to make customers successful\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Account Strategist - understand where the customer’s business and align account strategy accordingly and in alignment with the customer\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Business Builder with an entrepreneurial mindset - finding opportunities for your customers to adopt new products, use cases across different business lines\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys. Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB, and help us make an impact on the world!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day.
