This role will report to the Regional Manager, Customer Success.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Our ideal candidate will have\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proven experience working in a Customer Success, Account Management, or similar customer-focused role\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with large-scale, technologically sophisticated, Enterprise-scale customers in a fast paced SaaS environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A mind for technology! We’ll teach you all about MongoDB and databases, but our customers and product are inherently technical and you should have an aptitude and curiosity to learn about those concepts and how you can position product value to our customers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior exposure to database, cloud and infrastructure technology is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;High levels of organization in your workflows - you understand what it means to be responsible for a strategic customer portfolio and to prioritize your time across all of your customers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A passion for partnership and collaboration! You’ll be working with multiple teams on a regular basis (Sales, Marketing, Support, Product, Professional Services) and will help to build the CS “brand” across our entire organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Outstanding verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present to technical and business stakeholders, both internally and externally\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proficiency in German language skills is required for this role\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build meaningful and strategic relationships with customers across various stakeholders, working closely with other MongoDB partners\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead customer and project onboarding experience, validating and identifying customer needs, potential challenges, and key project timelines to ensure we’re meeting expectations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Promote and encourage implementation of paid MongoDB features across your assigned customer portfolio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively and early identify and mitigate risk of churn\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ensure high customer satisfaction and referenceability\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help to develop and implement standard methodologies, processes, and tools to continually improve MongoDB’s Customer Success Program\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;A successful CSM will have the following skills\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Risk Mitigator - identifying technical or business blockers to success for customers and proactively mitigate them by rallying the necessary resources\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Personal Trusted Advisor - recommending standard and advanced methodologies in order to make customers successful\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Account Strategist - understand where the customer’s business and align account strategy accordingly and in alignment with the customer\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Business Builder with an entrepreneurial mindset - finding opportunities for your customers to adopt new products, use cases across different business lines\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys. Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB, and help us make an impact on the world!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. Polish speaking","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $137.6 billion by 2026!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;The role\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for a motivated, hardworking and hands-on Customer Success Manager (CSM) to help our customers realize and improve the value of their MongoDB subscription and services.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Individuals in this role have a passion for technology and the ambition to dive head-first into new challenges; are adaptive and excited to help innovate with new processes and contribute to what’s already been built. We’re looking for someone who thrives by having daily interactions with customers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Customer Success team at MongoDB is responsible for establishing relationships and becoming a trusted advisor and “go-to” person for standard methodologies and advice. We are an integral part of our customer’s success with MongoDB and bring value to every interaction - from onboarding and product adoption to growth. We are a distributed team spread across our offices in New York City, Austin, Dublin and Sydney. This role will report to the Regional Manager, Customer Success.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Our ideal candidate will have\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proven experience working in a Customer Success, Account Management, or similar customer-focused role\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with large-scale, technologically sophisticated accounts and/or Enterprise market customers in a fast paced SaaS environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A mind for technology! We’ll teach you all about MongoDB and databases, but our customers and product are inherently technical and you should have an aptitude and curiosity to learn about those concepts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior exposure to database, cloud and infrastructure technology is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;High levels of organization in your workflows - you understand what it means to be responsible for a customer portfolio and to prioritize your time efficiently\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A passion for partnership and collaboration! You’ll be working with multiple teams on a regular basis (Sales, Marketing, Support, Product, etc) and will help to build the CS “brand” across our entire organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Outstanding verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present to a diverse audience, both internally and externally\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fluent in English, German and Polish\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build active and meaningful relationships with customers, working closely with other MongoDB partners\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead new customer and project onboarding meetings, validating and identifying customer needs, potential challenges, and key project timelines\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Promote and encourage implementation of paid MongoDB features across your assigned customer portfolio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Optimally identify and mitigate risk of churn\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ensure high customer satisfaction and referenceability\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help to develop and implement standard methodologies, processes, and tools to continually improve MongoDB’s Customer Success Program\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;As a CSM, you will be successful when you can become a(n):\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Risk Mitigator - identifying blockers to success and preventing long term churn\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Personal Trusted Advisor - recommending standard methodologies in order to make the client successful\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Account Strategist - helping MongoDB see where the customer’s business is going\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Business Builder - finding opportunities for your customers to adopt new features and open new use cases\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Individuals in the Customer Success Manager role have a passion for technology and the ambition to dive head-first into new challenges. This is a relatively new role at MongoDB, so we are looking for someone who can thrive with a high level of ambiguity and operate autonomously while maintaining a customer centric approach and helping to build the program. In this role you will also become a main\u0026amp;nbsp; point of contact for MongoDB end users by leveraging your technical and account management skills as well as acting as the account team leader across Sales, Professional Services, Solutions Architects, etc.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Singapore office for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Our ideal candidate will have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years experience working in a Customer Success, Account Management, Client Services or other similarly customer-centric role\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A background and passion for advocating on behalf of your customers - this role should act as an extension of our customers team within MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A mind for technology - we’ll teach you about MongoDB and databases, but our customers and product are inherently technical and you should have an aptitude and curiosity to learn about those concepts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to act with a high level of autonomy, you will be expected to take full ownership of your customer portfolio and make key decisions to drive effective customer outcomes; including deciding when to include our executive team or c-suite in customer escalations, how to de-risk or de-escalate customer issues and conflict and advocating to internal teams including sales, professional services, etc\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;An entrepreneurial mindset - this is a new team at MongoDB where you will be required to both deviate from established procedure and often build entirely new process or practices to ensure we best serve this customer segment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Team player and passion for collaboration - this role will work with some of our most strategic growth customers so must align closely to Sales, Professional Services, Tech Services, and the broader MDB ecosystem\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior exposure to database, cloud, and infrastructure technology is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Bilingual Thai language skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;On a given day in this role you will\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work as a strategic advisor to your customer providing them with guidance on MongoDB best practices and their overall technology strategy; this could include running enablement sessions alone or with another internal MongoDB team members, advising the customer on strategies to optimize their technical environment or current spend with MongoDB, positioning and recommending product features and best practices to accelerate customers time to value and growth\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collect feedback and identify roadblocks from customers to inform internal teams including Product, Professional Services, and Leadership on how MongoDB can build a stronger product and go to market organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Act as the link between our customers and product engineering to develop new innovative solutions. You will be key in building the future roadmap of our product by acting as the Product team’s eyes and ears in this field\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;De-escalate and resolve critical customer issues and complaints by finding the best possible solution for both the customer and MongoDB; this could include anything from navigating a customer outage that has a financial impact on their business, to helping an application team devise a custom MongoDB solution or implementation for their critical application, no day is the same\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build and execute account plans to mitigate risk and drive growth 3+ quarters out across your portfolio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead in-person executive business reviews for strategic customers in your portfolio, including interfacing with C-suite executives and other technical leaders to align to business objectives and agree to a mutual success plan\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work on strategic internal projects to help build the Customer Success program; our expectation is that anyone in this role has strong business acumen and the ability to create and teach best practices, new process, and enablement to the broader organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Document all customer interactions in internal systems, including Gainsight and Salesforce.com\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide feedback and guidance to leadership on key signals within MongoDB Atlas that indicate healthy or unhealthy customer accounts; We think strategically and are clear on what we are and are not trying to do\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Build Together: We achieve outstanding things by connecting and demonstrating the diversity of skills, experiences, and backgrounds of our entire organization\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Embrace the Power of Differences: We commit to crafting a culture of inclusion by seeking and valuing employees from different backgrounds and circumstances. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Director of Leadership Development has a critical role to play in this journey. The People Team is currently focused on rolling out and embedding a new framework for culture that we call the Leadership Commitment. The Commitment defines expectations for every person at MongoDB, including our people leaders, and these expectations collectively define our culture. The Director of Leadership Development will lead the creation of innovative, results-driven leadership programs for our people, starting with senior leaders. Eventually, the Director will be accountable for Leadership Development programming for everyone at MongoDB, helping our people experience a true inflection point in their careers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role is a part of the Culture and Development Team, a Center of Excellence on the People Team. of Engineering, ML Platform","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $136 billion by 2027!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re hiring a Director of Engineering to build a new team responsible for designing, building and maintaining an ML platform to power adoption of AI/ML across MongoDB.\u0026amp;nbsp; The new role will work closely with stakeholders and partners from Product, Engineering, Data Science and our internal Data Platform team to design a solution that addresses both near and longer term platform and product requirements, including infrastructure to support data pipelines, data observability, and the full model lifecycle (training, orchestration, inference, validation). The platform will drive product features and how we run our global Atlas fleet.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB\u0026#39;s Developer Data Platform encompasses many developer focused services such as MongoDB Atlas Database, Atlas Search, Atlas Data Federation, Atlas Application Services and many more. The fully integrated platform enables developers to deploy fault-tolerant, secure, globally distributed, fully integrated, services quickly and reliably. The new ML platform will power real-time, mission-critical applications of machine learning and large language models supporting MongoDB’s Developer Data Platform.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The team is a startup within the company.\u0026amp;nbsp; This role is an opportunity to be a founding member of the team building MongoDB’s ML platform.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our New York City office or remotely in the North American region.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Responsibilities / What you’ll do...\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead a team responsible for designing, building, and maintaining MongoDB’s ML Platform, supporting real-time data pipelines, data observability, as well as training, orchestration, and productization of machine learning and large language models.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Accelerate the productization of AI/ML innovations into production code via infrastructure that can perform at scale and is resilient.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with data science, product management, product engineering, infrastructure engineering, as well as other teams within the company, to define the first iteration and future evolution of the ML platform.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with internal Data Platform leadership to minimise duplication of effort.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Shape architecture, development practices, and escalation policies as the teams and\u0026amp;nbsp; platform usage grow.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Address platform requirements so that support engineers can quickly detect and correct issues in production.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Develop and maintain tools and processes supporting automated platform testing and live upgrades of platform software.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Stay in regular communication with data science, product and product engineering teams to understand how the platform can best assist in other teams\u0026#39; objectives.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead the process, in collaboration with MongoDB recruiting, to hire the right mix of skills and experience for the team, considering both internal and external candidates.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in code review and contribute to technical standards.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Mentor junior developers.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Qualifications / We’re looking for someone scientists.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proven success designing, building, testing, debugging, and performance tuning of distributed and/or highly concurrent software systems.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to think through requirements and choose the right architecture and tooling to incrementally build systems while addressing ownership and accountability\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Team player who lives MongoDB’s values and thrives in a diverse and inclusive work We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for a seasoned Strategy \u0026amp;amp; Planning professional to help us build and lead out the Customer Success Strategy \u0026amp;amp; Planning function worldwide. You will be responsible for learning the ins and outs of each major MongoDB Sales and CSM Business, play a critical role in building relationships with the senior leadership team, developing the team, and drive forward initiatives that will help us unlock sales revenue. The ideal candidate understands what makes a team thrive, has a strong interest in data analysis to tell stories, and thrives in shaping narratives that are conducive to helping our Sales team grow.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our Strategy and Planning team, part of our broader Sales Operations team, strives to help our field organizations go faster and grow faster. This function acts as business partners to our Senior Leaders. You have an opportunity to embed yourself as the “COO” of the CSM business, and your responsibilities will range across a variety of strategic initiatives including analyzing inefficient business rules, piloting new roles / engagement mechanisms, optimizing for obstacles in the sales / csm partnership process, and analyzing sales data to come up with meaningful business insights.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in New York City for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The Opportunity\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As the Lead of Strategy and Planning, you will:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead a team of analytical business partners that are aligned to the CSM organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help drive the analytical rhythm of our business including quarterly business reviews, org deep dives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with Senior leadership to drive customer, market\u0026amp;nbsp; and segment specific analyses to uncover insight\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Become an expert in business and customer success rules\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Conceptualize and pilot new programs to test the effectiveness of various roles / comp plans / engagement mechanisms\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in quarterly and annual business planning for the CSM teams\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with various business units to drive productivity and headcount scenario analyses\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The Ideal Candidate\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Bachelor’s Degree with a quantitative focus (Economics, Finance, Computer Science, Mathematics, etc.)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5+ years of work experience in either Sales Strategy / Consulting / Sales Operations / Analytics\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have experience managing a team or supervising multiple direct reports\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Effective communicator who can break down convoluted technical concepts into simple business vernacular\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong SQL knowledge with an ability to write SQL queries to extract data needed for analysis is preferred but not required\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are a spreadsheet wizard with the ability to manipulate and analyze data\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with at least one major business intelligence tool (Tableau,Google Data Studio,Looker)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are familiar with databases, and the differences between “relational” vs. “non relational”\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You can navigate your way around Salesforce with relative ease\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture Technical Services","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $136 billion by 2027!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Director of Technical Services helps lead the team that is responsible for cultivating our customers’ success and has a direct impact on our company’s growth.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Dublin for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Technical Services team is responsible for providing advice and support for MongoDB, the most popular next-generation database, in use across a wide variety of industries and use-cases. The Technical Services teams that you’ll manage at MongoDB are responsible for ensuring customer success in their use of MongoDB through:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Applying strong problem solving skills, diverse technology experience, and knowledge of MongoDB products and applications in order to assist in the implementation and troubleshooting of a wide range of innovative customer applications and environments\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Consulting on application or schema design\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Optimizing performance and solving scalability issues\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Resolving production outages\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Designing and reviewing operational procedures like business continuity plans\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Explaining the internals of MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Drive customer success by leading the team who are solving challenging technical problems, all the way from design through to production operations.\u0026amp;nbsp; This includes managing their teams’ workflow and high value interactions with our escalation management team managing both internal and external escalations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Grow and lead a distributed regional team, including coordinating, mentoring, and actively recruiting new members of the team in partnership with our local recruiting team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Interface with the various departments in the company and represent the Technical Services team in those interactions, being a champion for our customers and for our company’s success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Contribute to global projects, which can include various aspects of program management including process, automation, and tooling\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Candidate Profile\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Director, of Technical Services must have the technical skills to understand the various issues above, as well as the leadership ability to help build, mentor, and grow the rest of the Technical Services team. The MongoDB staff have a fanatical commitment to our customers’ success and it’s important that you share that.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Director, Technical Services reports into the Area Vice President for EMEA and will be supervising the leaders of teams of technical services engineers in their region.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The ideal candidate will have\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong management and leadership skills, with hands-on experience building and running teams of people leaders, including developing leaders and their direct reports\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Practical experience running a technical support team or organization, including experience coordinating high profile customer escalations, collaborating with other internal engineering departments, and working closely with sales teams\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A history of building organisational change and process improvement both regionally and across a global team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to think on your feet, remain calm under pressure, and help the team solve problems in real-time\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong background in diagnostic/ troubleshooting processes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strengths in relationship building and maximizing team performance in a high growth and rapidly evolving environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent communication and presentation skills, written and verbal\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Director of Technical Services will be successful in this role if they steadily build a solid team that directly contributes to our customers’ success.\u0026amp;nbsp; After a ramping period they should first begin to build internal relationships across departments to help coordinate work and responses to customer issues, and later begin to establish relationships with key customer accounts to allow for proactive, positive communications and engage with them before escalations are required.\u0026amp;nbsp; In scenarios where escalations are unavoidable, the Director of Technical Services will be able to successfully take a senior leadership position in the escalation response, including assembling a response team of technical resources, coordinating their work, working with the global escalation management team, communicating to the customer success organisation, our customer and to executive management, and ensuring that we learn from the situation in an effort to constantly improve the way we support our customers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys.\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/channel/culture\u0026quot;\u0026gt; Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, and help us make an impact on the world!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. The Enterprise Account Executive role focuses exclusively on formulating and executing a sales strategy within an assigned territory , resulting in revenue growth and new customer acquisition.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;MongoDB’s Sales Culture\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is always developing and innovating — not only in our technology, but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you will be doing\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively, identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strategically prospect into CTOs, Engineering/IT Leaders, \u0026amp;amp; technical end users\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with our Solution Architects and work closely with the Professional Services and Customer Success team to achieve customer satisfaction\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the enterprise ecosystem partner sales and channel partner to maximize deal sizes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in our sales enablement trainings, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamp, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you bring to the table\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;10+ years field experience of quota-carrying experience in a fast-paced and competitive market with a focus on expanding new accounts. Demonstrated ability to sell into new lines of business within open accounts and run a complex sales process \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A proven track record of overachievement and hitting sales targets\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Skilled in building business champions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fluent in English\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Must live in territory\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Driven and competitive; Possess a strong desire to be successful\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Previous Sales Methodology training (e.g. MEDDIC, SPIN, Challenger Sales)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with databases, develops and open source technology a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Why join now\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;MongoDB invests a HUGE amount of development into each of our new hires \u0026amp;amp; continuous career development\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Accelerators up to 30%\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Best in breed Sales trainings in MEDDIC and Command of the Message, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamps and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;New hire stock equity (RSUs) and employee stock purchase plan\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. The Enterprise Account Executive, Acquisition role focuses exclusively on formulating and executing a sales strategy within an assigned territory, resulting in new customer acquisition.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;MongoDB’s Sales Culture\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is always developing and innovating — not only in our technology, but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you will be doing\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively, identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;(100% net new logo)\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Close business to meet and exceed monthly, quarterly and annual new business targets\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strategically prospect into Engineers, Developers, IT Leaders, technical end users, CTOs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with our Solution Architects, CSMs and work closely with the Professional Services team to achieve customer satisfaction\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the enterprise ecosystem partner sales and channel partner to maximize deal sizes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in our sales enablement trainings, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamp, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you will bring to the focus on new business\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrated ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A track We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role is based in either our Berlin or Munich office.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;About the role\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re looking for a hardworking, driven individual with superb energy, passion and initiative for new business acquisition. The Account Executive role focuses exclusively on formulating and executing a sales strategy within an assigned territory, resulting in revenue growth and new customer acquisition.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;About the Sales Culture\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is always developing and innovating — not only in our technology, but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you will be doing\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Proactively, identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline (100% net new logos)\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Strategically prospect into CTOs, Engineering/IT Leaders, \u0026amp;amp; We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you will be doing\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively, identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strategically prospect into CTOs, Engineering/IT Leaders, \u0026amp;amp; technical end users\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with our Solution Architects and work closely with the Professional Services team to achieve customer satisfaction\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the enterprise ecosystem partner sales and channel partner to maximise deal sizes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in our sales enablement trainings, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamp, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you will bring to the table\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years field experience of quota-carrying experience in a fast-paced and competitive market with a focus on closing net new logos\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrated ability to open new accounts and run a complex sales process\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A proven track record of overachievement and hitting sales targets\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Skilled in building business champions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Driven and competitive. Possess a strong desire to be successful\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fluent in English and German\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Must live in territory (DACH)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Things we love\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Passionate about growing your career in the largest market in software (database)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Previous Sales Methodology training (e.g. MEDDIC, SPIN, Challenger Sales)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with databases, develops and open source technology a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Why join now\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;MongoDB invests 8x the industry average in development of each of our new hires \u0026amp;amp; continuous career development\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Accelerators up to 30%\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Best in breed Sales trainings in MEDDIC and Command of the Message, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamps and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;New hire stock equity (RSUs) and employee stock purchase plan\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Generous and competitive\u0026amp;nbsp;benefits\u0026amp;nbsp;(parental leave, fertility \u0026amp;amp; wellbeing support)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Friendly and inclusive workplace culture -\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/channel/culture\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys.\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/channel/culture\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, and help us make an impact on the world!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re looking for a hardworking, driven individual with superb energy, passion and initiative for new business acquisition. The Enterprise Account Executive role focuses exclusively on formulating and executing a sales strategy within an assigned territory, resulting in revenue growth and new customer acquisition.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;MongoDB’s Sales Culture\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is always developing and innovating — not only in our technology, but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Los Angeles for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you will be doing\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively, identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strategically prospect into CTOs, Engineering/IT Leaders, \u0026amp;amp; technical end users.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with our Solution Architects and work closely with the Professional Services team to achieve customer satisfaction\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the enterprise ecosystem partner sales and channel partner to maximize deal sizes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in our sales enablement trainings, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamp, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you bring to the table\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5+ years field experience of quota-carrying experience in a fast-paced and competitive market with a focus on closing net new logos. Demonstrated ability to open new accounts and run a complex sales process\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A proven track record of overachievement and hitting sales targets\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Skilled in building business champions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fluent in English\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Must live in Los Angeles\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Driven and competitive. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you will be doing\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively, identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline (100% net new logos)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strategically prospect into CTOs, Engineering/IT Leaders, \u0026amp;amp; technical end users\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with our Solution Architects and work closely with the Professional Services team to achieve customer satisfaction\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the enterprise ecosystem partner sales and channel partner to maximise deal sizes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in our sales enablement trainings, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamp, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you will bring to the table\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years field experience of quota-carrying experience in a fast-paced and competitive market with a focus on closing net new logos\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrated ability to open new accounts and run a complex sales process\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A proven track record of overachievement and hitting sales targets\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Skilled in building business champions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Driven and competitive. The Enterprise Account Executive role focuses exclusively on formulating and executing a sales strategy within an assigned territory, resulting in revenue growth and new customer acquisition.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;About the Sales Culture\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is always developing and innovating — not only in our technology, but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you will be doing\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively, identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strategically prospect into CTOs, Engineering/IT Leaders, \u0026amp;amp; technical end users\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with our Solution Architects and work closely with the Professional Services team to achieve customer satisfaction\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the enterprise ecosystem partner sales and channel partner to maximize deal sizes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in our sales enablement trainings, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamp, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you will bring to the table\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;8+ years of field experience of quota-carrying experience in a fast-paced and competitive market\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrated ability to open new accounts and run a complex sales process\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A proven track record of overachievement and hitting sales targets\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Skilled in building business champions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Driven and competitive. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Servicing the fastest growing database ecosystem presents new challenges every day, MongoDB is seeking an Escalation Manager for the Technical Services organisation (Support) to play an important role and work internally with our Engineering, Services, Sales, and Product Management teams, as well as externally with some really high profile customers and partners. You\u0026#39;ll help coordinate the resolution of critical technical issues across the whole portfolio of MongoDB’s ‘cutting edge’ products.\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;This role will give you a chance to become part of the Escalations Team, start growing your business and technical acumen while helping to maintain high levels of customer satisfaction. We will give you the education and tools to be highly proficient with MongoDB, and you will be exposed to numerous Fortune 1000 customers, real world use cases and cutting-edge applications.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our Singapore office.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Team Description\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Technical Services has over 300 global team members in offices including Sydney, Austin, Palo Alto, New York, Delhi, Tel Aviv, and Dublin. There are also team members who work remotely and are home to their nearest support office. Outstanding customer satisfaction is achieved utilizing a 24x7x365 ‘follow-the-sun’ support model with regional teams covering Americas, EMEA, and APAC regions.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The right candidate for this role\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Enjoys assisting customers out of the most stressful situations; Ensures that the customer’s voice is heard throughout the escalation process, helps establish correct expectations, and helps drive the resolution of the case through effective internal and external communication\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Communicates contextual details of the escalation clearly. Communication skills are central to success in this role, from negotiation and objection handling skills to presenting the appropriate level of summary information to different groups during different stages of the escalation, including post-mortem analysis and discussion\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Treats others with patience, empathy, and has a genuine desire to help\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Is highly organised, eloquent, and adept at taking charge of situations while multi-tasking in a fast-paced environment;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiar with the key differences between running a service or an application\u0026amp;nbsp; on-premises versus\u0026amp;nbsp; in the Cloud (e.g. hosted on Amazon Web Services)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You’ll get bonus points for a MongoDB or Cloud Certification\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Language skills (Mandarin, English)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Immediately engage with the customer for the escalation acknowledgement, initial assessment of the escalated situation, outline business impact and production impact\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Setting and resetting customer expectations on status and timelines;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Track escalation progress and able to timely communicate status updates, action plan \u0026amp;amp; resolution to customer \u0026amp;amp; internal stakeholders\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ensure that our Follow-the-Sun model is effectively and consistently utilised to resolve managed escalations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify and record escalation trends\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Determining, alongside Engineering subject matter experts, who within MongoDB will need to be involved in order to resolve the escalation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;working to obtaining the commitment of Engineering and Field leadership to dedicate the agreed-upon resources to the resolution of the escalation;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Co-own and lead the creation of post-incident report (or root cause analysis)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Developing and sending regular (textual) executive summaries to internal stakeholders, including members of the executive team as necessary, until escalation is resolved\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ensuring timely delivery of all MongoDB commitments to customers and internal stakeholders, along with other MongoDB managers, and actively communicating any deliverables that slip schedule\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Escalation Manager will be successful in this role by building strong relationships with our customers in escalated situations and in reducing the impact of escalated support cases.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;In your first year you will have successfully \u0026amp;amp; independently handled at least thirty escalations and received positive feedback on them, produce at least one independent post-incident document and manage it end-to-end, developed a list of Subject-Matter-Experts (SME’s) to engage in escalations related to specific product areas. \u0026amp;nbsp; After each escalation, you will run a “post-mortem” review of the escalation to document what we learned and to make ongoing suggestions for improving our related processes, documents, and tools.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys.\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/channel/culture\u0026quot;\u0026gt; Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, and help us make an impact on the world!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. To request an accommodation due to a disability, please inform your recruiter.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p style=\u0026quot;text-align: center;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;MongoDB Director, Escalations \u0026 Incident Response","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $137.6 billion by 2026!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We have an incredible opportunity for a transformational leader to join the MongoDB Technical Services team, leading the Global Incident Response Team, incorporating Incident Management and Escalations. This will be a player-coach role that oversees the team that ensures our customers and prospects are able to successfully run MongoDB at scale and helps them navigate any “bumps in the road” they may encounter.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Typical responsibilities of the team include:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Managing critical, “seconds matter” production down incidents to rapid closure\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Overseeing post-incident root cause analyses, including ongoing continuous improvement in broader Technical Services organization to prevent future recurrence\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborating with sales, communications, customer success and other field teams on addressing issues which may be impeding expansion of use within an account\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partnering with managers and engineers within the organization to proactively prevent escalations by aligning the right resource to the right activity at the right time\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborating with the product management and engineering teams to address issues which necessitate attention from those teams (including advocating for feature requests, where appropriate)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This is a role with a tremendous amount of customer interface. Our customers are the best and brightest in the business and they have great expectations of our products and our company. If you are the type of person who enjoys helping customers, managing complex and fast-moving situations, and applying preparation and active rehearsal to often complicated technical emergencies, this is the job for you.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Technical Services team is growing quickly. This role will have a significant impact on the success of the global organization, helping to position our escalation management for scale, efficiency and top-notch customer satisfaction.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Dublin, Ireland or New York City, NY for our hybrid working model. We\u0026#39;re also looking to speak with candidates in the following markets: Denver, Palo Alto \u0026amp;amp; San Francisco, Salt Lake City, Vancouver, Austin, Boston, Philadelphia\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Team Overview:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Technical Services has nearly 350 global team members in offices spanning the entire globe. The Americas team has offices in New York City, Austin, Palo Alto, Toronto, Vancouver, and Buenos Aires. Outstanding customer satisfaction is achieved utilizing a 24x7x365 ‘follow-the-sun’ support model with regional teams covering the Americas, EMEA, and APAC regions.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Candidate Profile:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h4\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;em\u0026gt;Required\u0026lt;/em\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;At least ten (10) years experience in a highly technical, post-sale leadership role at a software company in either a Customer Support or Professional Services role.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with implementing whole-company high-severity issue de-escalation patterns that maximize customer experience and company efficiency.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead post-incident problem recurrence prevention efforts\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience sourcing, hiring and developing global teams.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with implementing ITIL, Incident Command, and knowledge services.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to support virtual and on-site meetings with customers, and competently manage a presentation to a group of up to 30 people who possess varying role levels (from engineers to C-level executives).\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior global people management experience with a focus on career development in a high-growth, rapidly changing corporate environment.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience managing escalations at scale (multiple escalations per week spanning global resources), as well as managing cross-functional response (sales, customer success, support, professional services, engineering, product management).\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h4\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;em\u0026gt;Desirable\u0026lt;/em\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior experience as a software engineer or devops expert is desirable, as MongoDB is a highly technical platform product and successful candidates typically are comfortable with light programming, writing queries, and operating in a command shell.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prior work at a database company, specifically in the NoSQL market, or a similar highly concurrent distributed system used in production architectures.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Born-in-the-cloud SaaS experience. IaaS or PaaS highly desirable.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience producing management dashboards and scorecards using tools like Tableau.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success days\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Complete our new hire technical training program; be able to speak confidently about our total portfolio of products\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be able to navigate our core products at a beginner level\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Network with Peers across Customer situations.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Implements effective bi-directional communication between the escalation management team and the Americas management team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h4\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;At 120 days and management as a company-wide program; inventories tools, assets and processes, and begins planning requests-for-investment to scale capabilities.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Conducts an on-site interview with a marquee customer who has recently experienced a high-severity (business-impacting), make at least one change to process and/or systems to improve future customer experience.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Produces growth plans for the team of regional managers of escalations and their escalation program\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h4\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Within 60 processes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Initiates 1on1s with key stakeholders across field-facing and product development organizations to build cross-functional relationships and maintain consistent communications about escalations current and recently closed (e.g. covering specific account details, strategy, overall wellness of the program)Is able to handle a minor process escalation independently\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Begin conducting regular 1on1s with staff of escalation managers as well as other managers within Technical Services\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Catalog incident types and begin building incident response playbooks\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h4\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Within 90 days\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrates ability to handle more complex escalations and emergency situations.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Implements effective bi-directional communication between the escalation management team and the Americas management team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h4\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;At 120 days and onward:\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Develops first draft of a strategic roadmap for escalation management as a company-wide program; inventories tools, assets and processes, and begins planning requests-for-investment to scale capabilities.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Conducts an on-site interview with a marquee customer who has recently experienced a high-severity (business-impacting), make at least one change to process and/or systems to improve future customer experience.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Produces growth plans for the team of regional managers of escalations and their escalation managers.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is looking for a highly motivated individual to join our Global RFP function. This is a new role and joins a newly formed team responsible for the completion of all phases of the RFP process for qualified opportunities. We are looking for someone who is driven and passionate, has strong organization skills and can work globally to demanding deadlines and across different time zones. On a day-to-day basis, you will be responsible for partnering with the various teams who are responsible with responding to RFPs, RFIs, and Security Questionnaires and collaborating with members of these teams (Security, Finance, Legal, Solution Architects, Products, Sales,\u0026amp;nbsp; Deal Strategy and other functions) to ensure content is completed in a timely manner.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you’re passionate about providing a world-class customer experience, and thrive in a fast-paced, hyper-growth startup environment, then joining this team is the career path for you!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Responsibilities:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Security, Finance, Legal, Solution Architects, Products, Sales,\u0026amp;nbsp; Deal Strategy etc.) to gather proposal content and actively respond to in-depth RFPs, RFIs, and Security Questionnaires.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Analyze RFPs, RFIs, and Security Questionnaires to compile content/input from sales, technical teams, and various stakeholders to ensure content is completed in a timely manner.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proofread proposal content for accuracy and conduct quality checks to ensure proposals are error-free and compliant. Interpret and address specific requirements outlined in RFPs and communicate progress regularly and clearly to the relevant stakeholders, ensuring that major issues are escalated and addressed.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Coordinate inputs from subject matter experts to create comprehensive responses while managing proposal timelines and deadlines.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify areas for process improvement within the proposal development lifecycle and implement best practices/lessons learned from previous proposals.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the RFP Program Manager to assist and drive global best practices to develop and implement proposal review processes.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the RFP Program Manager and cross-functional teams/subject matter experts for content generation and building/updating a content repository/content library, includes creating and maintaining documentation for RFP processes.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the RFP Program Manager to identify areas of opportunity for continuous improvement, increased efficiency and productivity.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Requirements:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Minimum 4-5 years’ related work experience in RFPs/RFIs, Proposal writing or similar.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Preferred experience in a high-functioning sales or sales support organization, SaaS environment in a plus.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience completing RFIs/RFPs/Security Questionnaires. Possess good working knowledge and understanding of the RFP process.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with the content management and automation capabilities of RFP software like RFPIO, Loopio, or similar.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent editing, proofreading, and verbal communication skills.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong ability to work collaboratively and communicate effectively with remote and on-site team members.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work to time constraints while maintaining a high level of attention to detail; prioritizing tasks and setting expectations accordingly, especially under pressure.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Highly organized and a self-motivated team player.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Must thrive on the excitement and challenge of being on a lean and busy team.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with CRM systems (Salesforce, etc.) preferred.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The Opportunity\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re looking for reps that are hungry to sell into the next up-and-coming companies in EMEA that are disruptive within their respective industries. order processing\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with the Sales ecosystem like Marketing, Account Development, Solutions Architects, and closing experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with software, database, infrastructure, or open source technology a plus (NOT a performer)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent presentation, verbal, and written communication skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrated success with cold calling
