At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is seeking an HRIS Engineer who will be a trusted resource in our HR system platforms, act as a consultant to the organization -- understand processes and where data exists, what limitations there may be, and how to transform into actionable solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Human Resources, HR technology, and is interested in building highly strategic and impactful solutions using a variety of technologies.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our Bengaluru/Gurugram office or remotely in the India region.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experienced in direct client interaction working with key stakeholders and customers to provide solutions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborating with business stakeholders to understand their HRIS requirements and provide expert guidance on system configuration and best practices including all available solution options\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Serves as the regional point of contact for HRIS operations in India, managing and resolving any escalated issues.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Responsible for the administration, configuration and on-going maintenance of various modules within our HRIS cloud systems as assigned\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be a point person for end to end company-wide HRIS projects and systems, with ability to interpret business needs and evaluate, enhance and build tools to automate scalable processes, and present ideas and recommendations to senior leadership\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Responsible for understanding existing integrations and designing new integrations as needs arise\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide day-to-day system production support, including resolution of all system related issues\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Conduct and coordinate testing for system enhancements and system changes due to new or changing business requirements, as well as software upgrades and releases\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Develop, document, and maintain system admin procedures, and employee resource guides\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Submit and monitor open tickets for system fixes or enhancements globally\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Monitor global workflow, functionality, and permissions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Qualifications\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;7+ years of hands-on HRIS administrator and configuration experience in 2-3 SAP SuccessFactors modules (Employee Central is required); additional module expertise is a plus\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Administrator experience in other HRIS applications related to Learning, Performance, Reporting and other various HR systems\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to independently assess system configurations and partner with business process owners to identify opportunities for improvement\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience using reporting/query tools and data management tools\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Enthusiasm for learning new technology and a passion for process improvement and data integrity; interest in driving administrative efficiency with accuracy\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Extensive experience leading transformation projects as an implementer with multiple large, full cycle HRIS implementations, including design of complex system solutions, configuration, and integrations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent analytical skills, organizational, and time management skills with the ability to set priorities to coordinate multiple assignments with fluctuating and time-sensitive deadlines\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Expert understanding of HR processes and data to ensure correct and efficient integration of HRIS system\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong presentation skills for varied audiences, including executives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience in the creation of proofs of concept to present to various stakeholders throughout the organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Bachelor\u0026#39;s Degree or equivalent experience in a related field preferred\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central certification is highly desirable; other certifications are a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB, as a database software and consistently voted the\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/stack-overflow-research-most-wanted-database\u0026quot;\u0026gt;#1 most wanted database\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; preferred by developers, is continuing to attract the most demanding, innovative companies and development teams in enterprise software.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To meet this demand, we are looking for passionate technologists to join our growing \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/transitioning-teacher-mongodbs-new-enterprise-modernization-team-meet-gabriela-preiss\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Industry Solutions Team\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, a remote/flexible, globally-dispersed team. Our objective is to align MongoDB as an industry solution and ensure we understand enterprise clients and their needs to modernize software legacies, transition to modernized solutions, and guide them through continuous data-driven modernization.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;One of the functions of our team, as Industry Solutions, is messaging the direction of MongoDB’s platform as a part of a solution to specific industries. This is done in the form of \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;content creation\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;, industry-focused demos (such as our team’s usage-based insurance \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/building-digital-data-pipelines-transforming-underwriting-usage-based-insurance-mongodb\u0026quot;\u0026gt;demo\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;), and leading projects that help drive forward accounts (such as sales enablement, account workshops, internal newsletters, etc.).\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Although we have a team of Specialists focusing on industry specific work, this specific role will be cross-industry with a focus on helping us with our team’s content planning, generation, and management.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;This is a great opportunity for individuals with a communications/writing background and technical experience, interested in the business solution space, to dive deep into a cross-functional team and be part of one of the fastest growing companies.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re looking for someone who is willing to learn fast and is able to understand the technology we work with, communicate it in a language our clients use, and work with our global Industry Solutions Team on their projects, taking into consideration the different focal verticals. This role leads towards a consultant role and beyond, with a career trajectory we build out with you, based on your interests and strengths.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our team is an exciting, diverse group, made up of ambitious, innovative thinkers that range from software thought leaders and entrepreneurs to young professionals. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Team:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is seeking a passionate Information Security Engineer to help expand MongoDB’s Information Security Program, specifically focusing on the development of\u0026amp;nbsp; Application Security systems.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The MongoDB Security Team is responsible for the Information Security Program for MongoDB Inc; helping to reduce risk in our systems, and company and to help establish trust in our product offerings and cloud services. Our customers are both our internal MongoDB employees and our external customers.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This is an exciting chance to be part of a dynamic and innovative team with a lot of opportunities to grow. MongoDB prides itself on offering careers rather than jobs.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Role Description:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is looking for an experienced professional to join our security team. The ideal candidate will have at least 2 years+ of experience in Information/Cyber Security AND ability to develop software in order to create innovative applications to address security gaps.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The primary focus of this role centers on internal tool development. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing software solutions to address a variety of information security challenges. Your primary objective will be to code and\u0026amp;nbsp; create robust and efficient tools that aid in the protection of our company\u0026#39;s digital assets.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The secondary focus will be helping our applications to be more secure - e.g. by helping application owners to understand full application release lifecycles, penetration testing, assistance with code reviews and more.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role is technical, focusing mainly on development work, but will also present an opportunity to improve company-wide processes focusing on application security.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Candidate Profile:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Candidates for this role should have experience in software development and possess a deep understanding of programming languages and software development best practices. Ideal candidates will also have experience in SDLC, pentesting or security reviews and awareness of different approaches to application security.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for someone who is proactive in presenting ideas with demonstrated problem-solving skills. skills.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;The ideal candidate for this ReactJS/JS/Python.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Intermediate knowledge and understanding of application security, security engineering, system and network security, authentication and SaaS) technologies (like AWS, GCP, GSuite)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong experience with application architecture reviews\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with and systems, including but not limited to tools focused on automation and automation of asset inventory.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Continuously assess and improve existing internal tools for performance, scalability, and security, with a special emphasis on enhancing automation capabilities and maintaining an accurate asset inventory.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Cross-collaborate with other team members to understand security needs and translate them into functional software The Technical Services Knowledge Engineer is a dynamic role that combines technical writing, programming skills, technical experience, and innovative approaches to problem solving to curate and share collective product insight with MongoDB team members and customers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our Technical Services team use their exceptional problem-solving and customer-service skills, along with their deep technical experience, to advise customers and to solve their complex MongoDB problems. The Knowledge Engineer works closely with this team to foster the creation of content which can be referenced internally or by our many customers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role will appeal to a technically curious individual with a background in both technical communication and software development who wishes to advance their career in key areas such as information management, AI-based search technologies, web development, and technical writing.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role is requires individuals to go into our Austin office 2-3 days a week.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Develop, maintain, and continually improve MongoDB content for internal and external reference including technical articles, training material, and code samples\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Review technical content for accuracy, clarity, and presentation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Advocate for knowledge sharing by subject matter experts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Report on and analyze support case deflection metrics using data from federated search and other available sources\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Analyze customer support issues and assist in identifying and addressing knowledge gaps\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Contribute to internal technical projects such as authoring workflow, software tools, and infrastructure maintenance\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with adjacent Technical Services internal enablement efforts, such as Education and Product Readiness\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Follow Knowledge Management processes and best practices to enable customer self-service success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Requirements\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;At least 3-5 years experience producing written technical communication in English\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Diverse technical writing skills, including experience producing conceptual, procedural, and reference information for a technical developer audience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Extreme attention to detail and an above-average degree of patience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The desire and ability to rapidly learn a wide variety of new technical skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Comfortable working in an Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is seeking a Salesforce support Admin for the CRM Support team who is a proactive individual that can help us continually improve and enhance our Salesforce platform, gathering requirements and feedback, designing scalable best practice solutions, and managing the product roadmap. The Salesforce Administrator should enjoy all aspects of user management including support tickets, training, and designing solutions with user satisfaction as a priority.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for someone with a good understanding of the Salesforce platform, who can understand both our current setup and our business objectives, to quickly identify improvement areas. The Salesforce Administrator should be comfortable with change management and governance, as well as communicating, prioritizing, and managing all aspects of a Salesforce project. The ideal candidate will be liaising with stakeholders at all levels, with the ability to communicate technical information in layman’s terms, clearly explaining design/logic options and their potential impact.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead, mentor, and manage a team of Salesforce Support Admins/ Engineers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Set performance goals, conduct regular performance evaluations, and provide coaching to team members\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Offer technical guidance to the support team, assisting with complex technical issues and escalations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Stay up-to-date with the latest Salesforce products and features to guide the team effectively\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Oversee the resolution of complex technical issues, ensuring timely and effective solutions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Handle escalations from customers and guide the team in providing satisfactory resolutions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Maintain strong relationships with key customers and stakeholders\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Monitor customer feedback, track trends, and implement improvements based on customer insights\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Continuously evaluate and improve the support processes to enhance efficiency and effectiveness\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Implement best practices and ensure adherence to established procedures\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Generate and analyze support performance reports, identifying areas for improvement and addressing challenges\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide insights and recommendations to higher management based on data analysis\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with team members to develop and maintain a comprehensive knowledge base, troubleshooting guides, and FAQs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Organize training sessions to enhance the technical skills and knowledge of support engineers \u0026amp;amp; Foster a culture of learning and continuous improvement within the team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with other pods, to address customer needs and drive product improvements\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Achieve monthly targets for key performance indicators (KPIs) like Customer Satisfaction (CSAT), Productivity, and Service Level Agreements (SLAs)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Minimum and Lightning Web Components (LWC)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong knowledge of CI/CD processes for Salesforce applications and experience implementing deployment pipelines\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with sales-related processes, including commissions, bookings, FinancialForce, and integrations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to debug and fix complex technical issues\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Leadership At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.Our Strategy and Planning team, part of our broader Sales Operations team, strives to help our Sales organization scale and grow faster. This function will act as the key business partner to our VP of Product Led Success, Account Management and Renewals. You have an opportunity to embed yourself as the “COO” of that business, and your responsibilities will range across a variety of strategic initiatives including piloting and scaling up new projects, analyzing data to come up with meaningful business insights, and optimizing processes.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for a tenured professional to help us build and lead out this global function over time. You will be responsible for learning the ins and outs of each major MongoDB CS Business, play a critical role in building relationships with the senior leadership team, and drive forward initiatives that will help us unlock sales revenue. The ideal candidate understands what makes a Field team thrive, has a strong interest in data analysis to tell stories, and thrives in shaping narratives that are conducive to helping our teams grow.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;The Opportunity\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As a Manager of Strategy and Planning, you will:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Drive the analytical rhythm of our business including monthly and quarterly business reviews, forecasting, org deep dives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Operate the forecasting rhythm together with the business leader; able to run calls independently\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify segment specific analyses to uncover insights, influence key decisions, and shape longer term vision of the team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to efficiently pull data and derive insights based on a business problem posed\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Drive the systems strategy and processes required to scale up new commercial teams\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify emerging trends in the business and flag to the business leader\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Become an expert in understanding sales KPIs and implications on performance tracking, compensation and forecasting. Provide self service data availability\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Conceptualize and pilot new programs to test the effectiveness of various sales roles / comp plans\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with various business units to drive productivity and headcount scenario analyses\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The Ideal Candidate\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Bachelor’s Degree with a quantitative focus (Economics, Finance, Computer Science, Mathematics, etc.)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;6+ years of work experience in either Sales Strategy or Sales Operations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience as a business partner to sales or a field organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Thrives in working in a fast-paced working environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Effective communicator who can break down convoluted technical concepts into simple business vernacular\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience in a player-coach manager type role\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with consumption-based software business models\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are a spreadsheet wizard with the ability to manipulate and analyze data\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with at least one major business intelligence tool (Tableau, Google Data Studio, Looker)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You can navigate your way around Salesforce with relative ease\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for an experienced and driven leader, with great energy, passion and initiative to manage a highly talented Pre-Sales Solution Architecture team.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Solution Architects partner with the rest of the go to market team to help our customers design and build solutions to address their business needs. Our team is made up of seasoned software architects, entrepreneurs, and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success. As an integral component of the sales team, they shoulder the responsibility in winning deals and driving the business forward. They are also trusted advisors to a wide range of users, from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As a Manager for Solutions Architecture, you will recruit and lead our Solutions Architects team across the region. You will partner closely with our sales leaders to define, improve and execute our sales strategies in the enterprise market; and you\u0026#39;ll play a key role in driving the business forward by developing our pre-sales practices, bringing the voice of experience and best practices while ensuring talent retention.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who plan to be available in Seoul, working in our hybrid model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Candidate Profile\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;4+ years of pre-sales experience, with strong commercial skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;2+ years Management experience, ideally in pre-sales, distributed team management preferred\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Goal oriented, with a track record of overachievement (Circle of Excellence, Leader of the Year, etc.)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Driven – you possess a strong desire to be successful\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Disciplined – you are skilled in managing time and resources and have a sound approach to technically qualifying opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Intelligent – you possess an aptitude to learn quickly and establish credibility\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent presentation and communication skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Database industry background a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Software development background a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to travel up to 50%\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will recruit, retain, and develop top pre-sales talent\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will partner with our sales teams to help ensure success in accounts ranging from mid-to-large enterprises\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will work closely with the Professional Services team to achieve customer satisfaction and with Marketing to conduct seminars, trade shows and other marketing related events\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will foster strong and effective relationships with customers, resulting in growth opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will coach the team to exceed monthly, quarterly and annual bookings objectives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys.\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/channel/culture\u0026quot;\u0026gt; Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, and help us make an impact on the world!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. Technical Services","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $138 billion \u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;by 2026!\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;). \u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;At M\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;ongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Technical Services has nearly 200 global team members in offices spanning the entire globe. The team has offices in New York City, Toronto, Austin, Palo Alto, Vancouver, Sydney, Gurgaon (India), Tel Aviv, Dublin, and Buenos Aires. Outstanding customer satisfaction is achieved utilizing a 24x7x365 ‘follow-the-sun’ support model with regional teams covering the Americas, EMEA, and APAC regions.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;We have an incredible opportunity for a transformational individual to join the MongoDB Technical Services team, leading a regional team of MongoDB ‘core’ Support Engineers.\u0026amp;nbsp; Individuals in this team are experts in addressing issues related to MongoDB’s ‘core’ database functions to enable successful customer implementations at scale.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Vancouver for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Typical responsibilities of the team include:\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Diagnosing and resolving performance related issues\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Advising on design and architecture including global distribution and replication of data to support high availability, low latency and meeting data sovereignty requirements\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Advising on upcoming roadmap features and advocating for the customer in articulating business cases to drive issue resolution\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Globally collaborating with peer teams to provide seamless and efficient regional handovers of follow-the-sun issues\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Continuously learning and growing skills via participation in training, maintaining industry awareness and development of training to share subject matter expertise more broadly across the team\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Increasing case-deflection numbers by contributing to knowledge-base, distributing knowledge to peers and the general MongoDB community\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Working on named accounts to build rapport and an in-depth understanding of customer architecture and environment(s) while encouraging expansion of use\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Our customers are the best and brightest in the business and they have great expectations of our products and our company. If you are the type of person who enjoys helping customers, managing complex, fast-moving situations and leading/managing a talented group of individuals who continuously delight our customers, then this role is for you!\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Qualifications/Requirements\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li teams.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Strong people The team has offices in New York City, Toronto, Austin, Palo Alto, Vancouver, Sydney, Gurgaon (India), Tel Aviv, Dublin, and Buenos Aires. Outstanding customer satisfaction is achieved utilizing a 24x7x365 ‘follow-the-sun’ support model with regional teams covering the Americas, EMEA, and APAC regions\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Technical Services team focuses on helping customers to be successful with MongoDB products. Learning and supporting these products will provide you with a great deal of exposure to modern technologies such as Cloud, Kubernetes, configuration management tools and managing instances in the public cloud (AWS, GCP and Azure).\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Required\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;A minimum of three (3) years regions.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;We have an incredible opportunity for a transformational individual to join the MongoDB Technical Services team, leading a regional team of MongoDB ‘core’ Support Engineers.\u0026amp;nbsp; Individuals in this team are experts in addressing issues related to MongoDB’s ‘core’ database functions to enable successful customer implementations at scale.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span include\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Advising on design and architecture including global distribution and replication of data to support high availability, low latency, and meeting data sovereignty requirements\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span resolution\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Globally collaborating with peer teams to provide seamless and efficient regional handovers of follow-the-sun issues\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Continuously learning and growing skills via participation in training, maintaining industry awareness and 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Increasing case-deflection numbers by contributing to knowledge-base, distributing knowledge to peers and use\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Our customers are the best and brightest in the business and they have great expectations of our products and our company. If you are the type of person who enjoys helping customers, managing complex, fast-moving situations and leading/managing a talented group of individuals who continuously delight our customers, then this role is for you!\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The Technical Services Manager, APAC will have the responsibility to manage and expand a highly skilled Technical Services team. You will work closely with the rest of our Technical Services Management team including equivalent roles in North America and EMEA\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;You will run local team meetings, and provide regular mentoring and guidance to your team, interface with the field, sales, product engineering and directly with the customer base on critical escalations and issue resolution\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Provide technical and management leadership, and work with other local leaders on behalf of the Technical Services organisation\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Coordinate with other support centers and leaders around the world (\u0026quot;follow the sun\u0026quot;) to ensure quality is maintained and processes are consistent globally\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Diagnose and triage problems at various levels of complexity and communicate solutions\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Communicate, coordinate and manage escalation of urgent and complex problems with the product engineering teams. As part of the global management team: design, develop, and implement processes, systems, and technology to support and enhance the Technical Services function, including workflow and incident management \u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Develop and implement practices that measure and improve the effectiveness and performance of the Technical Services function\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Contribute to internal technical projects, which can include software development, benchmarking, building documentation and training guides, and providing oversight on other engineers\u0026quot; project work\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li for the organisation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Optional, but encouraged: interact with the community at meet ups and conferences\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Qualifications/Requirements\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li teams\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Strong people management skills with a track record of building and managing individuals with a strong focus on customer experience and technical excellence\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li to lead-by-example with strong diagnostic and troubleshooting skills\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span Intern - 2024 (Barcelona)","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $136 billion by 2027!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team to help us \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;‘Think Big, Go Far’\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; this summer!\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As a Market Intelligence intern, you will learn to effectively message to developers and business-decision makers. You will have a unique opportunity to experience how a fast-growing technology company operates at the pivotal intersection between engineering and go-to-market. Throughout your internship you will be mentored by our management team, participate in training programs, and become a fully integrated member of the market intelligence team.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What we are looking for in you\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In the process of receiving a Bachelor’s or Master\u0026#39;s degree in an engineering, computing or an analytically-minded discipline (e.g. history or journalism)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have a passion for technology and a desire to understand it at a fundamental level\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have an analytical mindset that shows you’re able to effectively disseminate, evaluate, and make decisions based on both quantitative and qualitative inputs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have excellent verbal and written communication skills. You have strict and continual attention to detail in creating and proofing materials\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have strong interpersonal and communication skills; the ability to work collaboratively with stakeholders at all levels of the organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You possess the ability to analyze, process, and report on largely distributed information and statistics\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Your time management skills are stellar with the ability to prioritize and consistently meet deadlines. You possess excellent organizational, follow-up, and follow through skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are a self-starter that is excited to work in a fast-paced, team oriented environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are curious with a strong desire to learn, adapt and grow\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fluency in English (oral and written)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Eligible to obtain a University Internship Agreement for a 10-11 week full-time internship commencing in June/July 2024\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you’ll be doing\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will take something that is technically complex and make it understandable to a variety of audiences\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will translate technical concepts and patterns into business benefits\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will assist in delivering content, such as white papers, blogs, webinars, thought leadership, speaking events, etc. that communicates the competitive value of MongoDB as a leading industry solution\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will analyze and interpret diverse datasets to report trends and findings back to the team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will act as a liaison, gathering feedback from the field (e.g. quantitative and qualitative survey results and findings)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you’ll find at MongoDB\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Authentic Culture: A workplace where you are encouraged to bring your whole self to work, we believe that Embracing the Power of Differences is the best way to broaden our own perspectives and foster innovation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Personalized Mentorship: Pair up with a Market Intelligence Mentor, a Program Advisor from the Early Talent Recruitment Team, and an \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/careers/diversity-and-inclusion\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Employee Resource Group\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; (ERG) Guide to foster your growth\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Career Coaching Sessions: Access to \u0026quot;MonGROWDB\u0026quot;, a tailored training program designed uniquely for interns’ personal and professional development\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work-Life Harmony: Embrace \u0026quot;Bloom for Interns\u0026quot; with access to mental health benefits, paid time off, free lunch, At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for passionate technologists to join our Solution Consulting organization to ensure that our growth is grounded and guided by strong technical alignment with our platform and the needs of our customers.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Solution Architects are responsible for guiding our customers and partners to design and build reliable, scalable systems using our data platform. Our team is made up of seasoned software architects and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success, including the design of their software, deployment, and operations. You\u0026#39;ll work closely with our partner specialists and play a key role in winning deals and driving the business forward. You\u0026#39;ll be a trusted advisor to a wide range of users from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for hardworking technologists to join our Pre-Sales organization to ensure that our growth is grounded and guided by strong technical alignment with our platform and the needs of our customers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Pre-Sales Solution Architects are responsible for guiding our customers and users to craft and build reliable, scalable systems using our data platform. Our team is made up of hardworking software architects, entrepreneurs, and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success, including the design of their software, deployment, and operations. You\u0026#39;ll work closely with our sales reps and play a key role in winning deals and driving the business forward. You\u0026#39;ll be a trusted advisor to a wide range of users from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role will be based remotely in London.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;As an ideal candidate, you will have:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;4+ years of software development experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Solid understanding and ability to code with two or more modern scripting languages (e.g. Python, Node.js, SQL) and/or popular programming languages (e.g. C/C++, Java, C#)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with scalable and highly available distributed systems\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent presentation and interpersonal skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to travel up to 20%\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Nice to have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Pre-sales experience with enterprise software\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience selling databases and/or deploying applications with any of the major cloud providers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with database programming and data models\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A MongoDB Certification\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you do at business benefits for management and executives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Act as a liaison, collecting feedback from the field to relay back to the Product Management team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help drive demand through participation in both industry-known trade-shows as well account-based marketing events\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrate resilience and sound judgment in dealing with business challenges\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively seek opportunities to support and mentor other pre-sales team members and share standard methodologies\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you will Charts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Other Tools and connectors - Ops/Cloud Manager, Compass, Connector for BI, Connector for At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for passionate technologists to join our Pre-Sales organization to ensure that our growth is grounded and guided by strong technical alignment with our platform and the needs of our customers.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Pre-Sales Solution Architects are responsible for guiding our customers and users to design and build reliable, scalable systems using our data platform. Our team is made up of seasoned software architects, entrepreneurs, and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success, including the design of their software, deployment, and operations. You\u0026#39;ll work closely with our sales reps and play a key role in winning deals and driving the business forward. You\u0026#39;ll be a trusted advisor to a wide range of users from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based remotely in Toronto, Ontario, CA\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;As an ideal candidate, you will have:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years of software development experience\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Pre-sales experience with enterprise software (bonus!)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Working knowledge and ability to code with one or more modern scripting languages (e.g. Python, Node.js, SQL) and/or popular programming languages (e.g. C/C++, Java, C#)\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with scalable and highly available distributed systems\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent presentation and communication skills\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to travel up to 25%\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;As an ideal candidate, you may also have:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience selling databases and/or deploying applications with any of the major cloud providers\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with database programming and data models\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A MongoDB Certification\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you do at MongoDB:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You design systems, applications, architectures, patterns, and strategies for making the best use of MongoDB\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You confidently articulate the business value of MongoDB solutions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You partner with our sales team to help ensure success in accounts in assigned territory\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You align to support sales with activities such as technical discovery, demos, proof of value, presentation, sizing, and documentation of technical decision criteria\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You translate technical concepts and patterns into business benefits for management and executives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have an ability to drive customer demand within a sales territory, by being self-motivated, proactive and understanding the importance of a strong sense of urgency\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you will Lake\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Atlas Full-Text Compass, Connector for BI, Connector for Spark\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Market-relevant, complementary technologies e.g. Apache Kafka, At MongoDB, we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for hardworking technologists to join our Pre-Sales organization to ensure that our growth is grounded and guided by strong technical alignment with our platform and the needs of our customers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Pre-Sales Solution Architects are responsible for guiding our customers and users to craft and build reliable, scalable systems using our data platform. Our team is made up of hardworking software architects, entrepreneurs, and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success, including the design of their software, deployment, and operations. You\u0026#39;ll work closely with our sales reps and play a key role in winning deals and driving the business forward. You\u0026#39;ll be a trusted advisor to a wide range of users from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As MongoDB continues to expand product offerings and features within the MongoDB Atlas Data Platform, MongoDB is seeking an expert for our Realm mobile database and Atlas Device Sync product line.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role will focus on being a product specialist of Atlas Device Sync within the presales organization. Beyond the normal tasks of a MongoDB Solutions Architect, this specialist role will operate in a worldwide team, assist in the most complex mobile deal cycles, assist in mobile enablement, and work closely with the Atlas product team to close the feedback loop and further enhance the product moving forward.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;As an ideal candidate, you will have\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years of mobile data expertise in relevant technologies (Core Data, SQLite, Room, Realm, Firebase, Couchbase Mobile, or similar)\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years of software development experience in mobile development (Swift, .NET/Xamarin/MAUI, Java/Kotlin, Flutter, or ReactNative)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiar with mobile client/server architectures (REST and GraphQL)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with scalable and highly available distributed systems\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent presentation and interpersonal skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to travel up to 30% of the time\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fluent in both English and either German or Spanish (spoken and written).\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;You may also have\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years of pre-sales experience with enterprise software\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Unity development experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Embedded system / IOT experience (C++)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience selling databases and/or deploying applications with any of the major cloud providers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with database programming and data models\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A MongoDB Certification\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you do at MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Advise customers on architectures, patterns, and strategies for making the best use of MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Expertly articulate the business value of MongoDB solutions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Align to support sales with activities such as technical discovery, demos, proof of value, presentation, sizing, and documentation of technical decision criteria; working across a number of opportunities in parallel\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Translate technical concepts and patterns into business benefits for management and executives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Act as a liaison, collecting feedback from the field to relay back to the Product Management team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help drive demand through participation in both industry-known trade-shows as well account-based marketing events\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrate resilience and sound judgment in dealing with business challenges\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively seek opportunities At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team to help us \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;‘Think Big, Go Far’\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; this summer!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We\u0026#39;re seeking a driven and analytically-minded individual to help iterate our existing support of Kubernetes. Since its release to the world by Google in 2015, Kubernetes has become the dominant global platform technology of choice for running containers at scale in a highly automated fashion, and MongoDB provides an ideal complement to any applications running in Kubernetes. The successful candidate will play a significant part by researching and proposing a solution that supports customers in a way that perfectly meets the business and technological needs of modern companies.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What we are looking for in you\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In the process of receiving a Bachelor’s or Master\u0026#39;s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, Data Science, or a related field\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Have a foundation in computer science theory, ideally with some knowledge of how applications are run and managed in public or private clouds.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent written and verbal communication\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent self-motivation and the ability to undertake research in a independent fashion\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to derive, explain and justify a conclusion and recommendation from disparate sources of data\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Due to complete studies in 2025\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you\u0026#39;ll find at MongoDB\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Authentic Culture: A workplace where you are encouraged to bring your whole self to work, we believe that Embracing the Power of Differences is the best way to broaden our own perspectives and foster innovation.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Personalized Mentorship: Pair up with an Product Management Mentor, a Program Advisor from the Early Talent Recruitment Team, and an \u0026lt;a At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Professional Services\u0026#39; exists to support the development of our customers’ vision, accelerate customers’ time to value, and drive a multitude of customer adoption scenarios - from building new solutions to modernizing legacy applications or migrating to cloud. Our consulting engagements ensure that our some of the most results-oriented and complex global organizations successfully deliver on their critical initiatives and get the best out of MongoDB.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Help us take our business to the next level of excellence in delivery and governance. You will have abundant opportunities to significantly impact the growth of MongoDB and collaborate with a team of technologists, sales and delivery professionals who are among the best in their fields.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Hong Kong for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Accountable for project planning and execution, customer experience, and ensuring MongoDB delivery meets committed scope and budget\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Employ project management excellence to navigate with agility the complex organizations of large enterprises, building mindshare to plan and execute programs likely to have ambiguous risks and challenges\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Maintain excellence of project governance with internal and customer stakeholders, managing day-to-day project planning and execution, project scope, expectations and risks, and ensuring timelines are met and quality results produced\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lend support to pre-sale engagements to assist with scoping of solution and project scope definition\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Adopt and contribute to the continuous improvement of MongoDB\u0026#39;s engagement and project delivery methodologies\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Confidently lead project meetings, owning meeting agenda and meeting outcomes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead the management of scope, change controls, customer expectations and timelines\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Measures of Success\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate directly with customers and other internal teams to lead and deliver high-quality, reference-able engagements\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Of paramount importance is predictability: of forecasts for resource needs and revenue; of internal \u0026amp;amp; customer stakeholder management; of outcomes; of risk management; of customer expectations and experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrate eye for business through robust control of the internal and external budget, project margin, resource utilization and billability across your entire project portfolio\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Candidate Profile\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;University degree or relevant work experience\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5+ years proven experience with enterprise-scale software solutions, large scale software engineering or consulting services delivery experience preferred\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrated leadership skills within complex, transformative projects, with direct responsibility for leading project teams, delivering high quality results on schedule and within budget\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Comfortable creating plans and priorities for both project delivery and customer resources\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrated belief in the power of stakeholder management and communications; track record of affecting change through stakeholder engagement\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Outstanding and effective interpersonal skills; strong verbal and written communication abilities\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Certification or deep experience with standard frameworks such as the PMI PMBOK, or Scrum methodologies would be practices\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We have been growing the Technical Services team to build upon the rapid success and adoption of MongoDB. We need to scale our process and systems to meet the growing needs of the team and customers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Project Manager, Technical Services will use their exceptional analytical and organizational skills to ensure that they prioritize the key initiatives and work with the global Technical Services organization and cross-functional departments to ensure timely, successful implementation.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Project Managers are a part of the Operations team within the Technical Services organization and play a critical role in the scaling of our elite Technical Services organization.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re looking for individuals who are willing to roll-up their sleeves and have a strong passion for driving excellence in program delivery by problem solving and collaborating across the global team.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Barcelona or Madrid for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with internal requirements, issues, and opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Use strong analytical and quantitative skills to verify assumptions, evaluate project outcomes and challenge the status quo\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Communicate effectively with both business and technical stakeholders at all levels of leadership\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously with high attention to detail and follow through\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify areas for process improvement and implement changes to increase efficiency, productivity, and organizational effectiveness\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Monitor and communicate project health, and manage project interdependencies by defining critical path project \u0026amp;amp; program level milestones; effectively communicating to all stakeholders\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Drive project execution planning (sprint planning) to ensure operational programs and projects are set up for success in their commitments\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Maintain timelines, requirements, scope and associated projects\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Possesses demonstrable analytical skills - able to use data to derive impactful insights and drive decisions in a business environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Enjoys working with Engineering types in a complex, fast-paced, start-up like technical environment that values innovation and speed to At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We have been growing the Technical Services team to build upon the rapid success and adoption of MongoDB. We need to scale our process and systems to meet the growing needs of the team and customers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Project Manager, Technical Services will use their exceptional analytical and organizational skills to ensure that they prioritize the key initiatives and work with the global Technical Services organization and cross-functional departments to ensure timely, successful implementation.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Project Managers are a part of the Operations team within the Technical Services organization and play a critical role in the scaling of our elite Technical Services organization.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re looking for individuals who are willing to roll-up their sleeves and have a strong passion for driving excellence in program delivery by problem solving and collaborating across the global team.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Barcelona or Madrid for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with internal stakeholders, managing day-to-day project planning, execution, scope, expectations, and risks, ensuring timelines are met and quality deliverables are produced\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with Technical Services Program Managers, team leads, and internal customers to enhance mechanisms for identifying and reporting status quo\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Communicate effectively with both business and technical stakeholders at all levels of leadership\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously with high attention to detail and follow through\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify areas for process improvement and implement changes to At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We like to say, “Come to MongoDB and get your Masters in Sales” and your “PHD in Leadership”. We’re investing in ways to not only attract, hire, and develop top talent but also ensure our Account Executives are set up for long-term success on their \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/bdr-cro-empowering-salespeople-own-their-career-path-mongodb\u0026quot;\u0026gt;individual career paths\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Come join our team and be at the forefront of what we believe is the perfect blend of career opportunity, innovative technology, and top-tier enablement!\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;The Opportunity:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is a true data platform with a comprehensive suite of tools to make working with data remarkably easy for everyone, from developers to analysts to data scientists.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are growing our High-Tech Account Executive team across North America to help \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/who-uses-mongodb\u0026quot;\u0026gt;our customers \u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;be more productive while still providing all the capabilities needed to meet the most complex requirements at any scale.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Day to Day:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Attract, Hire and Retain high achieving High Tech Account Executives and Regional Directors via all channels available (internal, external, self)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Drive a high performance, high accountability culture to achieve and exceed sales goals\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide strong coaching and mentoring through an understanding of the inside sales role, our business model, and our sales methodology;
