We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The inbound specialist is responsible for triaging warm inquiries to MongoDB, qualifying them for the sales team or redirecting them to the proper support channels. This role is a blend of sales and customer service, and can be a launchpad into a career in tech sales, marketing, customer success, or support.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The Opportunity\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Being a SDR at MongoDB is a first step to jump-starting a career in tech sales, marketing, customer success or support. At MongoDB, we have a culture that celebrates diversity, fosters growth and enablement, and ensures that we provide our SDRs with the tools and the confidence that they need to grow their careers. We invest heavily in the training and development of our team. You will always have the support from our sales enablement org and managers that will maintain 1:1 coaching throughout your career here.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our SDRs will gain international experience and an understanding of our product, who we sell to, why they care, what makes us relevant and how we best support our community. They learn how to generate a pipeline quickly and effectively as well as how to achieve a good discovery and qualification along with aligning with the proper support channels. The team is a crucial resource for sales and customer success teams across MongoDB and is seen as the talent pipeline by multiple areas of the business. This helps us scale our teams, as well as ensure that we have a culture of meritocracy.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role is a hybrid working model in our Dublin office.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Day to Day\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Respond to inbound inquiries via website chat, phone, and contact us forms\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Serve as the first point of contact, uncovering and qualifying new opportunities and establishing support needs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A mind for technology - we’ll teach you about MongoDB and databases, but our customers and product are inherently technical and you should have an aptitude and curiosity to learn about those concepts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborating with marketing and marketing ops to ensure timely and effective follow up to inbound leads\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;To be successful in this role and to be able to achieve your goals, you’ll need a talent and drive for finding new businesses, triaging support queries and developing strong relationships, both internally and externally, quickly\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to speak to a wide variety of customers on the phone as well as delivering meaningful outreach sequences to establish contact\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Understanding of the multiple business units to redirect queries in a customer centric manner\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Skills\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Self-motivated, with a team player mentality, you’re passionate about your work, eager to learn and motivated to develop a career in sales or customer success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Previous experience in a chat support or online customer interaction environment\u0026amp;nbsp; preferable\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have excellent listening, verbal and written skills (English), an additional language profeciency is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong process mindset and organization skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong attention to detail and time management\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong communication skills dealing with high volume of leads and communicating and following up with multiple stakeholders\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proficiency in using chat platforms, CRM systems, and other relevant software applications is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing customer needs and priorities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Invest in your self-development, focusing on the skills and attributes that will make you successful in your core role and get you set for future success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Expectation to contribute to the wider Inbound Strategy through continuous feedback and suggesting solutions to improve the customer experience \u0026amp;amp; business impact\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What You Will Bring to the Table\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A self-starter with a track record of hitting and exceeding goals\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Time management skills and ability to work either independently or through coaching\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Desire to work in a fast-paced and high growth environment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Passionate about cutting-edge technology with the aptitude to learn new and exciting IT software products, as well as, understand business critical solutions quickly\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Things We Love\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong and progressive academic background: Bachelor’s or Master\u0026#39;s Degree in Business or any related field\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proven track record of success in sales or business development or customer facing roles in a target driven environment, ideally in the tech industry\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with database, web server, and open source technology\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Working experience with Salesforce.com\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Why You Should Apply\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Great Earning development\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Benefits include:\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Sales Bootcamp\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Internal mentor and buddy program cross-departmentally\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This is an integral timely role within one of the fastest-growing enterprise software companies in the world. MongoDB continues to double the size of its revenue and global sales organization, building on unparalleled execution and a rapidly expanding customer base across industries and markets around the world. MongoDB, the leading modern data platform in a $70B+ market, is helping to transform industries with incredibly innovative applications.The continued and proven strength of our sales execution is just as important as the quality of our products and sets us apart from our competition. MongoDB has one of the most comprehensive and differentiating sales enablement programs in the industry. We have made a massive commitment in this area, with goals to continue to shorten ramp time and maximize the productivity of our sales force.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Field Enablement is delivered through the Global Sales Enablement organization and, as a team, reports to the Chief Revenue Officer. The team’s responsibilities include implementing and evolving our sales methodology, delivering relevant enablement \u0026amp;amp; training programs, providing targeted coaching, optimizing sales resources, and equipping leadership with actionable insights.\u0026amp;nbsp; We are constantly piloting and innovating our programs including leveraging technology, tools, and AI/ML to accelerate productivity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p class=\u0026quot;p1\u0026quot;\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in London Office for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Manager, Sales Enablement, is a featured part of the team designed to strategically improve performance of the sales organization.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities include\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Key member of the Field Enablement and Advisory team supporting MongoDB’s Growth segment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Design, develop and execute Sales Enablement solutions that align with constraints\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Establish relationships with Sales Leadership to translate feedback in clear and actionable ways.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Run skills gaps analysis to Identify areas of improvement in current sales representatives’ processes and mitigate future risk\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with cross-departmental units (business operations, marketing, channel, product, systems) to ensure all initiatives and programs run smoothly\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help to create and maintain impact analysis for current and new programs with clear iteration processes.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Monitor sales objectives and results as they relate to live sessions, asynchronous learning modules and workshop attendance\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Coach sellers and managers on best practices, selling skills, and strategies to drive revenue growth.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide continuous learning ever-boarding initiatives including sales process, sales methodologies,\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Production of in-person \u0026amp;amp; virtual trainings with domain expertise and passion\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Development of content that makes complex concepts easy to understand\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Providing subject matter expertise to the field through both eLearning, remote learning,\u0026amp;nbsp; and in-person sessions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Leverage our suite of enablement and sales tools to enhance development and accelerate productivity\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;In your first 60 days, you sell\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Gain competency with our sales enablement tools (Chorus, Highspot, MindTickle) and content development process\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Shadow a key enablement training and support the completion of ~30% of related tasks\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Dive deep into team objectives and individual responsibilities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be a major contributor to content development for a net new training (eLearning or in-person)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with sales leadership to understand gaps and prioritize programs to develop and execute\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with the\u0026amp;nbsp; sales leaders in your region and segment\u0026amp;nbsp; to ensure the quality and execution of enablement programs are timely, relevant, and impactful\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;The ideal candidate will have\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;2+ years in sales enablement\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years field sales organization.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities include\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Own ramp\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Design and build content for and execute customized enablement programs as player/coach role\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be a leader on the productivity\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;The ideal candidate will We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. This role is a key member of our growing Sales Analytics team and is responsible for building and maintaining data infrastructure used by our global salesforce and leadership team, with a strong emphasis on stakeholder collaboration.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;You will have the opportunity to\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Get insights and various BI tools, develop analytics frameworks and see how data is used to drive business outcomes\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Accelerate your career through exposure to the most effective sales methodology and through working side by side with the best sales professionals in the industry\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Establish a strong network of peers and mentors\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Gain insight into a $60b+ technology industry that is rapidly transforming\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate closely with various stakeholders to understand their data needs and requirements\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Undertake project management responsibilities to effectively plan, organize, and oversee data analysis projects\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide dedicated support to team members and stakeholders, aiding in resolving data-related inquiries and challenges\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build tools to put data in the hands of our GTM teams to allow them to make data driven decisions and increase their At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re hiring a Senior Business Manager to work with the Chief Product Officer (CPO) on initiatives that improve internal processes or engage in new ways with other business units. The Product organization at MongoDB plays a crucial role in translating our customers\u0026#39; visions into value-generating realities, fast-tracking their transformation process, and managing a variety of customer engagement scenarios - from devising innovative solutions to upgrading legacy systems or facilitating the transition to the cloud. The Product team is not only responsible for ensuring that organizations fully leverage the power of MongoDB throughout their digital journey, but also play a vital role in driving the revenue growth for MongoDB.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As a Senior Business Manager you will help us take the Product organization to the next level of scale and excellence. You will have abundant opportunities to meaningfully impact the growth of our business as you work closely with the CPO and collaborate across all functions of the business, both internal and external, from Product and Engineering to the rest of the company.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our New York City office or remotely in the North American region.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What the role involves\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The Senior Business Manager works directly for the Head of Product Research and Operations to support the Chief Product Officer (CPO)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Crafting and executing strategic business initiatives and operational programs in close partnership with product leaders and other key stakeholders across the company\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Assuming day-to-day responsibility for projects and tasks, ensuring progress and successful completion of projects indirectly for some and owning project execution and coordinating internal resources for others\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Creating and managing relationships to enable leadership success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Integrate with and work closely with the Product leadership team on ever-changing priorities including strategic planning, organizational transformation, product marketing and commercialization, field communications and team enablement, among other areas\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ensure clear, consolidated reporting of program status across a wide variety of initiatives both internal and external to the services organization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;This person will be encouraged to work end-to-end on projects that include a range of operational decisions and initiatives, change management, organizational enablement, and driving executive communications with internal and external partners\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;This is an opportunity to contribute meaningfully to the strategy of Product Management at MongoDB as the business continues to evolve to meet the demands of rapid scale and dynamic customer expectations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Candidate stakeholder alignment and cross-functional communication.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrates a high level of accountability and a huge sense of urgency in the support\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Should have product management experience and is able to adapt quickly to fast-paced, dynamic changes in a high-growth environment where novel challenges are common and information may be slim\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The candidate should have excellent written and spoken English skills. In a pre-sales perspective, BVCs engage with clients to capture and communicate the potential business value that our solutions provide. For post-Sales, BVCs validate the value, identify optimization opportunities and identify new growth opportunities. This role requires someone with strong analytical and technical skills, and who is comfortable working across multiple functional areas in a fast-paced, challenging environment.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based remotely in the North America region.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Surface insights to drive executive decision making across the business\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with Marketing teams and product to support design, execution and analysis of experiments across a variety of channels (paid ads, email and website) to optimize content to users and improve their experience in product\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Leverage deep understanding of statistics to conduct analyses that help partner teams make quicker, more informed decisions to help the business be more agile\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Write and maintain complex queries to conduct deep-dive analyses on the impact marketing initiatives have on acquisition, product activation and user retention\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with Data Architecture and Data Engineering teams to help create and optimize custom views and tables to enable reporting for marketing and growth teams\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Make the team more efficient: Research and implement new tooling/processes; The Senior Enterprise Account Executive role focuses exclusively on formulating and executing a sales strategy within an assigned territory, resulting in revenue growth and new customer acquisition.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is always changing and innovating — not only in our technology but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Mumbai for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively prospect, identify, qualify and develop a sales pipeline\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Close business to meet and exceed monthly, quarterly, and annual bookings objectives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in our sales enablement training, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamp, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the Professional Services team to achieve customer satisfaction\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Requirements\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;BA/BS required\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;8+ years of field experience in quota-carrying experience in a fast-paced and competitive market with a focus on growth business (Upsell \u0026amp;amp; Cross-sell)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;10+ years of SaaS sales experience.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrated ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A track record of overachievement and hitting sales targets\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Skilled in building business champions and running a complex sales process\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Previous Sales Methodology training (e.g. MEDDIC, SPIN, Challenger Sales)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with databases, DevOps, and open-source technology is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Driven and competitive: Possess a strong desire to be successful\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Skilled in managing time and resources; sound approach to qualifying opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Possess aptitude to learn quickly and establish credibility. The MongoDB community is transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day.\u0026amp;nbsp; We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. We are also driving innovation at MongoDB in the application of Generative AI. \u0026amp;nbsp; Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is looking for an outstanding person to join our newly create Field Engineering team and take on a key role in our extended R\u0026amp;amp;D organisation. Field Engineering is linking the work of teams engaged on application modernization roles with our Product and Engineering teams.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Since the invention of RDBMS, the cost of storage (and compute) has dropped by multiple orders of magnitude. At the same time the requirements towards systems in terms of scalability, resiliency and availability have increased massively. To take advantage of ubiquitous cheap storage a new generation of database technologies have been developed with MongoDB emerging as the “dominant document database”.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Many organisations have built up large estates of legacy applications. Lack of scalability and resilience, long development times, operating cost, and inability to run on cloud are common issues with these applications. To address these issues, organisations are engaging in large transformational Application Modernisation programs. Because MongoDB is recognized as the developer data platform of choice for transactional systems that provide the best scalability, resiliency and developer experience in the cloud as well as on premises, organisations are continuously migrating workloads from these legacy applications to new platforms, often based on microservices, using MongoDB.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Currently, these transformations are very time intensive and often risky. Tooling based on generative AI promises to accelerate these transformations in a way never seen before. Field Engineering is responsible to explore the possibilitites of these technologies and provide invaluable information to MongoDB’s R\u0026amp;amp;D teams to drive future capabilities of MognoDB and the MongoDB ecosystem.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Field Engineers will be embedded into project teams that are executing Application Modernisation projects with and for customers. The successful candidate will be responsible for evaluation and applying tools in these projects, facilitating the usage of such tools and processes across the project team, identifying opportunities for tooling deployment, selecting potential 3rd party tools, contributing to the development of tooling prototypes and helping to shape the product roadmap.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Our ideal candidate will have\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;10+ years of experience as a field engineer or professional services consultant or contracting full stack developer working directly with Enterprise clients.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Expert level knowledge about enterprise-scale software architectures, application development methodologies, and software deployment and operations.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Deep experience developing enterprise applications using relational databases, and employing SQL and stored procedures with Oracle, MS SQL Server, Sybase and/or PostgreSQL databases.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience of using and developing with MongoDB and JSON based Document models is highly desirable.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A curiosity in how AI supported toolchains can improve application development is desirable.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong problem solving skills, including the ability to collaborate across disciplines and teams to come up with creative solutions to technical and business challenges.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Willingness to dive into a complex domain, ask the right questions, and bring new software tools and technologies to the table to solve customer problems.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Great communication skills (both spoken and written), within the team and in customer meetings.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proficiency in Java and/or C#, and some familiarity with common database access patterns and frameworks in one or more of these languages.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Contribute to customer application modernization initiatives at any or all phases of the application lifecycle: assessment and analysis; planning and design; data modeling; application code conversion, development, test and build; integration and release configuration, production operations, application optimisation, and best practices adoption.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Test drive MongoDB migration products to deliver on customer use cases and drive adoption of the product. Deliver concise feedback to the rest of the development organisation.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with Product and Engineering teams to influence the direction of the MongoDB product roadmap.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Personally execute well-defined, outcome-focused projects, POC, MVP and everything in betweenPOCs including developing or extending existing tools when necessary and appropriate for customer success, with an eye towards reusability and eventual integration with our products. These are often on premises at client locations.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Maintain a broad and deep technical understanding of the product line and the underlying technologies and protocols.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work as part of a wider delivery team comprising consulting engineers from MongoDB Professional Services, project managers, and account teams.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Assist sales teams in evaluating opportunities with prospects and customers.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Willingness to work on site with customers for approximately 10 days per month and to travel to Australia two weeks per year to collaborate with the Product development team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Senior Field Engineer Application Modernization will be successful in this role when they can execute the following strategic tasks/responsibilities:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Become an expert level user of MongoDB, and our tools current migration products.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Develop a playbook for customer application migration engagements, in collaboration with other MongoDB Engineers, Product Management and Engineering.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Communicate complex technical proposals simply and convincingly to a wide range of audiences.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide unique insight into customer needs, product requirements and strategic opportunities by contributing experience from the At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Field Marketing Manager will be responsible for driving adoption, pipeline and revenue growth for MongoDB products through an integrated field marketing plan in your region. You’ll target both enterprise and corporate accounts as well as specific verticals by running field programs to fill the funnel and accelerate deals to close. Key responsibilities include planning, organizing, and executing events, field marketing, and account based marketing programs that support acquisition, demand generation and or accelerating\u0026amp;nbsp; existing opportunities.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;You’ll partner with\u0026amp;nbsp; the sales and partner organization,\u0026amp;nbsp; account-based marketing, partner marketing, and demand generation teams to translate the Go To Market strategy into a full funnel marketing plan to help to meet growth targets. \u0026amp;nbsp; You are a data and results driven marketer, a team player, and able to roll up your sleeves and get the job done!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The role will report into the Field Marketing Director, North Pacific Rim.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Candidate Profile\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our ideal candidate for this role will have the following\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;10+ years experience in Field Marketing with account management, event and marketing experience in a technology company\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstration of a metrics-driven approach to success and can show Return on Investment (ROI) by tracking results from funded/co-marketing activity against budget\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A strong team player who thrives in a fast-paced and high growth environment with the ability to prioritize, pivot and problem-solve\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A self-starter who possesses a growth mindset to help define the ambiguities to support a high growth organization\u0026amp;nbsp; \u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A strategic thinker who can find a balance between translating a business strategy into a marketing plan and seeing through the execution of the marketing plan and delivering against the set metrics\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent written and oral communications skills in English, Cantonese and Traditional Chinese\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Eloqua/Salesforce/Wrike experience a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A \u0026amp;nbsp; strong and credible business and marketing partner to the Regional Vice President, Regional Directors and Account Executives, with the ability to translate the needs of the business into a marketing plan for the region\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A strong understanding of B2B and persona-based marketing, with a strong grasp of\u0026amp;nbsp; B2B buyers’ decision making process and the B2B buyer and builder personas. Preferably he or she has some experience in conducting\u0026amp;nbsp; or leveraging 3rd party\u0026amp;nbsp; market research to understand buyers’ behavior\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A strong collaborator with the ability to take a programmatic approach\u0026amp;nbsp; to build an integrated marketing field plan.\u0026amp;nbsp; He or she should have a good understanding of\u0026amp;nbsp; the levers to work with and the ability to leverage the broader field marketing teams - partner marketing, global events, ABM programs,\u0026amp;nbsp; content marketing, product marketing, communications and digital marketing\u0026amp;nbsp; to scale and drive successes in his or her region\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;An effective communicator to the sales team and keep them updated on all planned marketing activities including global, regional, and local programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with the global events team to bring flagship events into the region, and ensure sellers leverage these events to drive customers’ engagement\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead joint partner marketing planning with the partners (GSI/ SI, Cloud partners, ISV) to identify co-marketing\u0026amp;nbsp; activities that are aligned and support the field marketing plan\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ensure performance and ROI are tracked, and supporting processes set up to effectively measure outcomes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;30% travel to Taiwan when required\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The Field Marketing Manager will be successful in this role when they can execute the following strategic tasks/responsibilities\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 3 months you’ll have fostered a relationship with your RVP, Regional Directors, Account Executives, understand their top target accounts, and begin planning field marketing opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 6 months you’ll have a clear understanding of your key objectives, have executed on pipeline generating campaigns , and supported with Global marketing campaigns\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 12 months you’ll have fostered relationship across internal MongoDB teams and have executed both strategic and scalable ABM programs, co-produced partner events leveraging the MongoDB partnership ecosystem, created an integrated plan in region, maintain flawless documentation and reporting of all programs to ensure success, and constantly strive for improvement and optimisation of your field marketing plan\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. They act as coaches, trusted advisors, change agents, consultants and thought partners on all things talent within the business. They work closely with other teams within the People Team to perform their role and responsibilities - this includes Employee Experience, Total Rewards, Learning \u0026amp;amp; Development, Engagement \u0026amp;amp; Inclusion, Talent Acquisition, HR Operations and People Analytics.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This Sr HRBP role is the ideal opportunity for someone who has extensive HR functional knowledge, and thrives in having multiple and different strategic interactions with business leaders and excels at facilitating Business as Usual (BAU) talent activities (ex: Performance cycles, Engagement surveys, etc).\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The role can be based out of our New York, Austin or Palo Alto offices with the ability to travel to relevant offices\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Key Responsibilities\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Builds relationships with leaders to offer thought leadership on organizational and people-related strategy and execution\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Adopts the culture of the organization and embodies our values and leadership principles\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Develops a commercial understanding of the business to appropriately guide and influence leaders on their talent agenda\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Applies expertise in the following areas: performance management, career planning, coaching, analysis of people data, compensation (cash and equity), complex employee relations issues, learning and development, and recognition programs.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Leverages data and other metrics to proactively identify and present solutions based on business needs. ISV Account Executive","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The database market is massive (IDC estimates it to be $121B+ by 2025!) and MongoDB is at the head of its disruption. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;We’re looking for a hardworking, driven individual with superb energy, passion and initiative for new business acquisition. The ISV Account Executive role focuses exclusively on formulating and executing a sales strategy within an assigned territory, resulting in revenue growth and new customer acquisition.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The Account Executive will be part of a brand new Business Division focused on selling to Independent Software Vendors (ISVs). This team of sellers will work with the world’s largest ISVs and convince them to re-platform off legacy databases as they move their products to hybrid cloud such SaaS and on-premise The team will be focused on helping these ISVs both adopt our products (sell-to ISV) as well as co-sell with them to joint end customers in the field (sell-with ISV).\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;MongoDB, as a Database platform, gets a unique leveraged effect when working with ISVs. This is one of the reasons we are investing in a dedicated sales organization to capture this market.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;By joining this team, as one of our first Sales Executives, you will have a unique opportunity in terms of learnings, earnings and career advancement.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;MongoDB is always changing and innovating — not only in our technology, but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Think Big and Go Far\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;This role will be based remotely in We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re looking for a hardworking, driven partner leader with superb energy, passion and initiative to join our highly talented Systems Integrator team. This role concentrates exclusively on building executive and developer-level relationships, formulating and executing a pipeline generation strategy through our Systems Integrator (SI) partners within assigned territories, resulting in aggressive pipeline growth and new customer acquisition.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;With a people-first culture, managing and leading our Sales team is top of mind. MongoDB is always changing and innovating — not only in our technology, but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “Think Big and Go Far.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Recruit and build strong and effective SI partner relationships, resulting in growth opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively prospect, identify, qualify and develop a sales pipeline to and through our Global/Regional System Integrators partners\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Interlock with our Cloud and Ecosystem(ISV/OEM) partners do accelerate consumption of identified SI pipelines.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with our Field Sales team to close business to meet and exceed monthly, quarterly and annual bookings objectives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Own, on behalf of VP - Area Sales, all things SI partner related\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Manage SI Partners at an Area level but loop back to Global team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Participate in our sales enablement trainings, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamp, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Have an in-depth and detailed understanding of MongoDB products to confidently provide mentorship for your Partner Sales team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Requirements\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5+ years field experience of quota-carrying experience in a fast-paced and competitive market with a focus on new business\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5+ years of quota-carrying experience generating pipeline and selling through Regional System Integrators and ISV in a heavy sales matrix model.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrated ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A track record of overachievement and hitting sales targets.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Skilled in building business champions and running a complex sales process\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Previous Sales Methodology training (e.g. MEDDIC, SPIN, Challenger Sales)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with databases, devops and open source technology a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Driven and competitive: Possess a strong desire to be successful\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Skilled in managing time and resources; sound approach to qualifying opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Possess aptitude to learn quickly and establish credibility. Developers can analyse their relational database schemas, make decisions on how the relational schema should be represented within a MongoDB schema (e.g. by denormalising or consolidating tables), and synchronise and transform data between the relational database and MongoDB.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Senior Product Designer At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our New York City office or remotely in the North America region.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;About the Team\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is focused on driving sustainable exponential growth and unlocking new business opportunities to maintain it. The Atlas team is responsible for building the most innovative developer data platform on the market, allowing users to deploy fully-managed multi-cloud MongoDB databases in 110+ regions globally across AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure with best-in-class automation and unparalleled stability. This team is at the forefront of innovation, having brought to life some of the most exciting features we’ve launched in the past, such as multi-cloud databases, workload-balanced autoscaling, and seamless connectivity to cloud providers. Furthermore, this team will continue to play a critical role as the platform expands to where developers need it most: AI, semantic search, application development, analytics, and more.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;About the Role\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Product Managers on the Atlas team work side-by-side with design, engineering, marketing, and analytics to develop solutions that our users love and that work for the business. You’ll spend your time deeply understanding customer problems, developing hypotheses, and validating them with design solutions. If you’re doing well, you will continuously be accelerating the rate at which our users learn, build, and deliver their products.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Provide an unparalleled customer experience by conceiving and driving new features, marketing programs, customer surveys, partnerships, pricing, and technical documentation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead the team to the right product decisions via deep engagement with Design, Marketing, Engineering, Executive Leadership, Sales, customers, prospects, and market analysis.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be passionate about the data around your products, ensuring business impact can be measured and used to continually hone products towards excellence.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Team with Sales, Technical Support and related groups as a strategic partner in customer engagements, able to clearly articulate MongDB Atlas’ features, functionality and value.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Drive execution against your plan; making trade-offs, anticipating needs, evaluating risks, and ensuring frequent and clear communication\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Requirements\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5+ years of experience in Product Management or with a complex technical product with a SaaS focus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong understanding of hyperscale cloud providers such as AWS, Azure, GCP, and first-party networking solutions they provide, including but not limited to peering, VPN, PrivateLink, Private Service Connect etc.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong understanding of various networking concepts (e.g. DNS, ACLs, security groups), topologies (e.g. hub-and-spoke, mesh, point-to-point) and various third-party networking solutions (e.g. Equinix, Tailscale, Teleport, CloudFlare Tunnel)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience and proven success in delivering software products to market\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Passion for solving problems for a developer audience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A growth mentality and ability to execute at a fast pace with a strong bias to action; you are always striving to stay ahead of the market and you get things done\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Self-starter who enjoys challenges across a broad range of technical subject areas\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Adept at navigating open-ended questions, relentless when identifying solutions, and driving them to completion\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, both written and verbal, enabling you to bridge gaps and bring multiple stakeholders toward the best solution via well researched and written business cases.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to communicate complex technical issues simply and convincingly to a wide range of audiences\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Nice to have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Development background/experience - any programming language\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Database experience - MongoDB experience is a plus\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Last, but not least, desire to take an active role in innovation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys.\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/channel/culture\u0026quot;\u0026gt; Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, and help us make an impact on the world!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. We’re a globally distributed team with developers in multiple time zones and continents. Our senior engineers are typically specialists in a particular programming language, but are capable of contributing to projects in other languages as well.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To work with this team, we are looking for a seasoned product manager who has a background in software engineering (ideally, library/API development \u0026amp;amp; management) - someone who would understand the desires of the developer community intimately from the user perspective.\u0026amp;nbsp; Therefore, our ideal candidate has hands-on experience building web applications, is a fast learner, and is comfortable with reading and noticing flaws in technical documentation and technical implementations. You are passionate about working with engineers and understand the software development lifecycle, and are able to crisply communicate what is ideal, what is acceptable, and what won’t work. You have spent time on sites like StackOverflow searching for solutions. You thrive when working independently, and communicate well both in person and to a crowd. You have an insatiable desire to constantly learn and improve yourself, and keeping your technical skills sharp is important to you despite working in a product role.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As the product manager, you will define what the user experience should be for a specific programming language community (for example: PHP, Golang, C#, Rust, etc). You will identify opportunities and prioritize product backlogs for the client libraries, framework integrations, or partnerships. You will help plan what we build and when, and be a strong partner with engineering leadership. You will maintain context on what’s new and important to developers. You will work with our technical documentation, DevRel, and services teams to ensure a cohesive experience.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Onboarding for this role includes building a working web application in the stack of your choice with MongoDB, writing a tutorial, and publishing it publicly. You will also introduce yourself to reddit language communities and submit talks for conferences that are technical in nature, triage issues, and sometimes reply to software engineers on community forums.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;The right candidate for this role should have\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;At least 2 years professional software engineering experience or a Computer Science degree or other engineering degree - the interviews for this position will include a live coding interview\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to communicate sophisticated technical issues simply and convincingly to a wide range of audiences\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to distill customer use cases and requirements, write comprehensive business cases and execute on them\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Nice to have: API design skills, MongoDB knowledge, experience with cloud technologies (AWS, GCP, Azure).\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Explore the problem space, interact with the users, formulate the vision and maintain the roadmap for your area, keeping it aligned with the company’s strategic priorities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Deeply understand all aspects of the business — your job is to ensure a business outcome, not just product definition!\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Communicate complex concepts in a manner that is easily understood by multiple audiences\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Define user experiences/scopes and provide necessary advocacy for them to be executed on\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the product design and engineering teams to design, architect, implement and ship new capabilities of the database to delight users\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Balance (sometimes conflicting) priorities on a roadmap to benefit users and enable new use cases, maintain a prioritized backlog\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Advocate for our users with passion about operational performance, predictability, and security\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collect and analyze data that will drive product decisions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with thought leaders from the respective language communities, establish credibility, and weigh in discussions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Keep your pulse on software engineering trends across language communities and advocate for new languages, frameworks etc\u0026amp;nbsp; to be added to our portfolio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be just as comfortable troubleshooting bugs and reviewing technical designs as \u0026amp;amp; other disciplines to ensure alignment and common success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Success built an application with the programming language of your choice and MongoDB, putting it in public on Github; successfully triaged new issues with the engineering team, taken ownership of the existing roadmap and the product backlog; got to know the team (this team is globally distributed) and started building relationships inside the company\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In six months, you will have reviewed / refined existing user stories and JIRA issues, prioritized and started executing on them with your\u0026amp;nbsp; engineering team; you will have also researched Product Manager, Developer Experience","content":"\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $136 billion by 2027!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The MongoDB Developer Experience team builds and maintains the rich set of\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://docs.mongodb.com/ecosystem/drivers/\u0026quot;\u0026gt; libraries\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; and integrations that serve as the primary developer interfaces to the MongoDB database, maintaining support for more than ten programming languages. We’re a globally distributed team with developers in multiple time zones and continents. Our senior engineers are typically specialists in a particular programming language, but are capable of contributing to projects in other languages as well.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To work with this team, we are looking for a seasoned product manager who has a background in software engineering (ideally, library/API development \u0026amp;amp; management) - someone who would understand the desires of the developer community intimately from the user perspective.\u0026amp;nbsp; Therefore, our ideal candidate has hands-on experience building web applications, is a fast learner, and is comfortable with reading and noticing flaws in technical documentation and technical implementations. You are passionate about working with engineers and understand the software development lifecycle, and are able to crisply communicate what is ideal, what is acceptable, and what won’t work. You have spent time on sites like StackOverflow searching for solutions. You thrive when working independently, and communicate well both in person and to a crowd. You have an insatiable desire to constantly learn and improve yourself, and keeping your technical skills sharp is important to you despite working in a product role.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As the product manager, you will define what the user experience should be for a specific programming language community (for example: PHP, Golang, C#, Rust, etc). You will identify opportunities and prioritize product backlogs for the client libraries, framework integrations, or partnerships. You will help plan what we build and when, and be a strong partner with engineering leadership. You will maintain context on what’s new and important to developers. You will work with our technical documentation, DevRel, and services teams to ensure a cohesive experience.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Onboarding for this role includes building a working web application in the stack of your choice with MongoDB, writing a tutorial, and publishing it publicly. You will also introduce yourself to reddit language communities and submit talks for conferences that are technical in nature, triage issues, and sometimes reply to software engineers on community forums.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The right candidate for this role should have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;At least 2 years professional software engineering experience or a Computer Science degree or other engineering degree - the interviews for this position will include a live coding interview\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to communicate sophisticated technical issues simply and convincingly to a wide range of audiences\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to distill customer use cases and requirements, write comprehensive business cases and execute on them\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Nice to have: API design skills, MongoDB knowledge, experience with cloud technologies (AWS, GCP, Azure).\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Explore the problem space, interact with the users, formulate the vision and maintain the roadmap for your area, keeping it aligned with the company’s strategic priorities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Deeply understand all aspects of the business — your job is to ensure a business outcome, not just product definition!\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Communicate complex concepts in a manner that is easily understood by multiple audiences\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Define user experiences/scopes and provide necessary advocacy for them to be executed on\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work closely with the product design and engineering teams to design, architect, implement and ship new capabilities of the database to delight users\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Balance (sometimes conflicting) priorities on a roadmap to benefit users and enable new use cases, maintain a prioritized backlog\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Advocate for our users with passion about operational performance, predictability, and security\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collect and analyze data that will drive product decisions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with thought leaders from the respective language communities, establish credibility, and weigh in discussions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Keep your pulse on software engineering trends across language communities and advocate for new languages, frameworks etc\u0026amp;nbsp; to be added to our portfolio\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Be just as comfortable troubleshooting bugs and reviewing technical designs as you would be collaborating on a marketing campaign, running a survey, or producing sales messaging\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with peers in product management, engineering \u0026amp;amp; other disciplines to ensure alignment and common success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In three months, you will have onboarded on the current MongoDB technologies \u0026amp;amp; tools, and built an application with the programming language of your choice and MongoDB, putting it in public on Github; successfully triaged new issues with the engineering team, taken ownership of the existing roadmap and the product backlog; got to know the team (this team is globally distributed) and started building relationships inside the company\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In six months, you will have reviewed / refined existing user stories and JIRA issues, prioritized and started executing on them with your\u0026amp;nbsp; engineering team; you will have also researched new and existing markets, identified some new trends and started their exploration in a methodical way\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In nine months, you have produced at least two GA releases of tier 1 drivers, several service releases, delighted users with new/improved experiences (you’ll need to define your metrics to measure customer success with your deliverables as well), identified new opportunities \u0026amp;amp; refined your roadmap, contributed to other projects, presented to customers, user groups, and conferences, and gained strong support of your team and other stakeholders\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. company.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our New York City office or remotely in the North America priorities, creating and presenting a framework to transform the existing CPQ implementation.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;This role should have technical acumen to be able to do basic CPQ configurations, draw wireframes, put together a solution, and document use cases.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Structure and execute operational and strategic initiatives by putting together work plans\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Use data to prioritize and discover opportunities and support decision-making\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Design user great ideas to life\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Define KPIs, measure success by tracking KPIs and adaptation of the key features and business value.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Communicate clearly and efficiently- coordinate product release communications and drive transformational change.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Prepare technical implementation and testing in close collaboration with Sales Operations partner in an agile setup\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Enjoy working in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, by creating products that will make a profound impact on the user\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Position Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is seeking a senior/staff engineer to join the product performance team. This team is responsible for understanding the performance of MongoDB \u0026amp;amp; sharing that knowledge internally and externally. We drive performance improvements for MongoDB products. As a result, customers get more predictable, scalable and efficient applications.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We foster a performance \u0026amp;amp; customer-oriented culture by writing performance workloads, running experiments, documenting conclusions and sharing what we’ve learned. An integral part of our work is talking to product engineers and managers to advocate for performance improvements, helping them add good performance tests and sharing \u0026amp;amp; contextualizing results.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The database is the beating heart of all software applications. If you want to experience a broad systems-perspective of technologies from processors, storage \u0026amp;amp; networks to cloud-based globally distributed systems - this is the role for you.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in New York City for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What we’re engineering.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Purposeful learners, who seek understanding and try new approaches when they encounter roadblocks\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Past work may include: developing self-taught skills, becoming the go-to resource for a particular domain, or performing a VTune™.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you have other experiences that speak to these skills, please do not hesitate to apply. performance tests to benchmark new features\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;In 3 test\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have a strong understanding of our performance framework and participate in roadmap discussions around new features to be be fully remote from an Eastern Time location. Apologies for the potential confusion**\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $138 billion\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;by 2026!\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;). \u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;At M\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;ongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The MongoDB Cloud Team is a diverse collection of individuals working together to provide MongoDB in the cloud at global scale. The Cloud Team is responsible for several services including MongoDB Atlas - our database as a service offering and fastest growing product, MongoDB Realm- our serverless platform offering that allows developers to build apps on MongoDB without managing any infrastructure, and our newest offering, Atlas Data Lake.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The Cloud Site Reliability Engineering Team designs and builds the global infrastructure on which we deploy our services. As our customers grow and globalize, our services must satisfy demands for low-latency requests around the globe, and comply with various data sovereignty requirements. The SRE Team’s mission is to build this increasingly complex infrastructure, while continually lowering the operational burden associated with it, and increasing our internal visibility into the health of the system. We are strong believers in infrastructure-as-code and self-healing systems. The SRE Team is fully integrated with all the other Cloud teams, and the teams work closely together with a soft and traversable boundary between their areas of responsibility.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Design and build the infrastructure for a global cloud service that comprises hundreds of thousands of MongoDB clusters, processes a billion metrics per day, and replicates tens of billions of database writes to our backup service\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Design, implement, and troubleshoot the automation and monitoring of services that seamlessly spans the globe - including several cloud providers\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Become an expert in infrastructure performance, helping us optimize from the application level all the way through the firmware\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Build for resilience. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The MongoDB Global Communications team is looking for a Senior Manager, Social Media \u0026amp;amp; Content to join the team to bring MongoDB’s story to life for the company’s target audiences. In this role, you’ll be responsible for ensuring that the mission and vision are being effectively communicated to target customers in external-facing channels. You’ll combine strategy and hands-on execution to support the global external communications strategy and build brand equity, drive awareness, and foster community engagement. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in developing and executing integrated communications campaigns, creating compelling content across various formats and channels, and tailoring messaging to specific audiences.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our San Francisco or New York offices with hybrid and remote options available. Occasional travel will be required.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Job Expectations\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Primary: Social Media\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Develop social channel-specific strategies and objectives that support the team’s goals and overall business priorities.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Manage social content production to support broader communications goals and campaigns.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ensure the company’s mission and vision are being effectively, and creatively, communicated to target customers using the brand’s voice and tone.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strategically leverage social media channels as a key element of integrated marketing campaigns, in collaboration with other members of the social team / global communications team.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Monitor industry trends and news and recommend activities that would drive brand awareness and engagement.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Track social media metrics and results. Create monthly reports and aggregate data into actionable insights to inform strategy and plans.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Evaluate new and existing channels based on the company’s needs.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Secondary: Content and External Communications\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Create compelling stories for target audiences; manage and collaborate with agencies and consultants to develop content\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Deliver messaging, story development, and engagement models for integrated campaigns\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with the Global Communications team and other internal partners to develop and execute proactive and strategic communication initiatives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Monitor, track, and analyze the impact of communications initiatives to iteratively refine strategy/plans\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Evaluate and enhance the Global Communications team’s processes and procedures\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Support the External Communications, Content \u0026amp;amp; Social Media Lead on issues communications as needed\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Target Outcomes\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Develop a calendar for social content, and manage production of content across various formats and channels\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Measure and report on the program results with a focus on our engagement quality and growth.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ensure communications\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Partner with the Global Communications team to support global strategy and ensure that business objectives are met\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;We’re looking for someone with…..\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Bachelor\u0026#39;s degree in public relations, content development, or related roles\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Creative storyteller, with the ability to take complex information and translate it to a compelling moderating, engaging, and cultivating strong advocacy within community social platforms\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proficiency in social media/marketing tools and content creation tools\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ability to help build our social media strategy while also being comfortable owning day-to-day execution and engaging with our community members\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proficiency in digital communication platforms and multimedia content approaches\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent written and
