At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is bolstering its team in Sydney, focusing on creating tools that guide customers in transitioning their applications from relational databases to MongoDB. As businesses evolve their application development frameworks, they\u0026#39;re increasingly drawn to the versatility of the document model. The Relational Migrator team, already instrumental in this area, aids developers in making the shift from relational databases to MongoDB. Now, they\u0026#39;re broadening their toolkit and are keen on refining code using a mix of AI and traditional text processing.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is seeking a Senior Software Engineer with solid software engineering skills and a machine learning background. Joining this team, you\u0026#39;ll be pivotal in a product engineering group dedicated to helping users navigate code conversion challenges with AI\u0026#39;s support.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role will be based in our Sydney office and offers a hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The ideal candidate for this role will have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5+ years of professional software development experience in Java or another programming language\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with generative AI and specifically LLMs is highly desirable\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with text processing engines such as ANTLR is highly desirable\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong understanding of software engineering, system design, data engineering and/or cloud architecture\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Have experience with compiler design, code parsing or related areas\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Familiarity with concepts like communication skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;In the Cloud API eXperience team we create delightful experiences that bring developers along on the journey from eager beginner to sophisticated MongoDB expert!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are part of the larger Cloud Services team, a diverse group of individuals who develop software to run MongoDB globally (see\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/cloud/atlas/\u0026quot;\u0026gt; MongoDB Atlas\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;). Our software and services allow users to deploy fault-tolerant, globally distributed MongoDB clusters in minutes.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As part of our team, you will work alongside engineers in the Cloud Services Team on drafting a modern technical design (including but not limited to authentication, documentation, testing, versioning) for our\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://docs.mongodb.com/cloud/\u0026quot;\u0026gt; REST APIs\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; and ensuring new and existing MongoDB users and developers have a best-in-class onboarding experience.\u0026amp;nbsp; You will also propose, design, and build (open-source) tools (e.g. \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://github.com/mongodb/mongocli\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;MongoDB Atlas CLI\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;) that achieve our mission.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for talented and passionate engineers at all seniority levels who are self-driven and consistently work to grow their careers!\u0026amp;nbsp; We pride ourselves on our team\u0026#39;s culture and on being an inclusive and collaborative group of people who\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/careers\u0026quot;\u0026gt; Build Together\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you\u0026#39;re enthusiastic about technology and eager to develop your skills, we encourage you to apply, regardless of whether you meet all qualifications at the outset or have prior experience with MongoDB or Atlas. In our culture of continuous learning, we value your potential to adapt to and master new technologies. Join us, and seize the opportunity to grow and make a meaningful impact.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role will be based in our Dublin office.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Who are you?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You’re passionate about programming and technology! You enjoy working with others to achieve a common goal.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You possess strong collaboration skills. Your experience, whether as a member of a remote team or in collaboration with one, is a significant asset, given our Cloud Services Engineers are spread across various locations and time zones.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are an adept organizer. You possess the skills to efficiently evaluate priorities, coordinate your schedule, and take action on tasks sequentially, maintaining a balance that promotes productivity and quality in your work.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are highly proficient in your preferred mainstream programming language. While our work primarily involves Java 11 and Golang 1.20, we appreciate diverse language expertise.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have experience building multi-threaded, asynchronous, distributed systems.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are flexible, readily taking on a broad array of responsibilities and learning as you go. With your ability to think conceptually, you excel in designing and delivering sophisticated, modular systems.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have good knowledge of Computer Science fundamentals (Data structures and Algorithms) and Object Orientation concepts.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have worked directly with production systems.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are familiar with services running on cloud infrastructure (e.g. \u0026lt;em\u0026gt;Amazon AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure\u0026lt;/em\u0026gt;).\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What is in it for you?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Generous compensation package (top-range salary, equity, comprehensive benefits)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Flexible working options (not a strict 9-6 role, focus on results, not the appearance of work)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You\u0026#39;ll be stepping into a culture of continuous learning. Our environment thrives on the exchange of knowledge, with ample opportunities to upskill in new technologies and develop professionally.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You can propose new and innovative ways to solve existing problems and code in more than one programming language.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will have a high level of independence in your day-to-day work.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You\u0026#39;ll be joining a good-humored encouraging team that deeply cares about its culture and wants to combine work and fun.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Upon joining every engineer will be provided with specialized in-depth training on the\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://university.mongodb.com/\u0026quot;\u0026gt; At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The MongoDB Catalog and Routing team carries the important responsibility of hiding the complexity of building a distributed database system. They implement scalable interfaces with strong consistency guarantees which are used by other MongoDB developers to navigate and organize user data. As a result, their work has a direct impact on the productivity of the entire organization and the success of MongoDB’s horizontal scaling strategy.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Recent work includes the addition of unpartitioned datasets to the catalog such that it can be balanced across multiple nodes without splitting a table’s keyspace, embedding cluster topology components to reduce the operational complexity of running a sharded cluster, and the ability to perform concurrent data definition operations.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Barcelona for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Candidate Profile\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Successful candidates will have majority of the following qualities\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Shown success in designing, writing, testing and maintaining distributed and/or highly concurrent software systems in large, long-lived C/C++ code bases\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proven experience in programming, debugging and performance tuning, and a strong grip on computer science fundamentals. Professional or advanced academic expertise in the areas of distributed systems and databases is preferable, but not strongly required\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent verbal and written technical communication skills and desire to collaborate with colleagues and mentor junior engineers and interns\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent time leadership skills and the ability to make realistic assessments of project complexity\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Regardless of prior experience, they are willing, able and excited to quickly learn new things in the domains of computer science and software engineering. They are curious about how people and organizations use MongoDB, and how MongoDB could be improved to enable more uses\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Understand and improve current functionality in MongoDB’s catalog and routing components\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify, design, implement, test and support new features in MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with other specialists to coordinate flawless changes in a feature-rich, large code base\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with product management and others to specify new features that delight our users\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Estimate task complexity and report progress and risks to peers and managers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Learn from and teach peers and junior engineers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Develop and maintain expertise in the modern practice and research of distributed systems and databases\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In the first month you will have understood the surface area and the high level architecture of MongoDB sharding, become familiar with the code areas with which it interfaces and fixed a few bugs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In three months you will have contributed to the development in C++ of a project slated for the next major release of MongoDB and diagnosed and fixed a few customer or testing-reported issues\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In six months, you will have tackled code review responsibilities and are involved in reviewing the design for new features\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In twelve months, you are owning the development of a new feature and are helping to mentor new engineers on the team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our New York City office or remotely in the North America region.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Overview of Team\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The MongoDB Cluster Scalability Team’s responsibility includes building features and interfaces for cluster operators to thrive managing datasets and workloads of all sizes. To that end, our goal is to enable users of MongoDB to scale their workload seamlessly from 100 to 100 billion operations a day. This ultimately enables the MongoDB goal of making users productive with data at any scale. Additionally, the team also advises other MongoDB developers to use MongoDB Server in a scalable way and advocates for improvements when bottlenecks are identified.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Synopsis of current/upcoming projects\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Recent work includes embedding cluster topology components to reduce the operational complexity of running a sharded cluster, ability to use shard key analyzer to pick a good shard key, and performance improvements to moving data across shards.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Candidate Profile\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Successful candidates will have majority of the following qualities\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience in building industrial-strength software projects with robust designs, a high level of code quality, and collaborative software development processes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience, with strong proficiency in data structures, algorithms, and software design/architecture. Professional or advanced academic expertise in the areas of distributed systems and databases is preferable, but not strongly required\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Interest in the theory and practice of database internals\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;At least 3 years of experience in programming, debugging, and performance tuning distributed and/or highly concurrent software systems\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with other Server team engineers to coordinate seamless changes in a feature-rich, large C++-based codebase\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify, design, implement, test, and support new server features\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Keep abreast of new database technologies and research, and work to incorporate them into the server\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Contribute to a world-renowned open source database software project\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Espouse and promote the MongoDB values through mentorship, building together, intellectual honesty, and accountability\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In three months, you’ll have contributed to the development of a project slated for the next major release, and diagnosed and fixed a few customer or testing-reported issues\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In six months, you’ll be responsible for reviewing code, interviewing potential new hires, and reviewing new feature designs\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In twelve months, you’re owning the development of a new major feature and are helping to mentor new engineers on the team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys.\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/channel/culture\u0026quot;\u0026gt; Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, and help us make an impact on the world!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is seeking a senior engineer to join the product performance team. This team is responsible for understanding the performance of MongoDB \u0026amp;amp; sharing that knowledge internally and externally. We drive performance* improvements for MongoDB products. As a result, customers get more predictable, scalable and efficient applications.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We foster a performance \u0026amp;amp; customer-oriented culture by writing performance workloads, running experiments, documenting conclusions and sharing what we’ve learned. An integral part of our work is talking to product engineers and managers to advocate for performance improvements, helping them add good performance tests and sharing \u0026amp;amp; contextualizing results.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The database is the beating heart of all software applications. If you want to experience a broad systems-perspective of technologies from processors, storage \u0026amp;amp; networks to cloud-based globally distributed systems - this is the role for you.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role will be based in our Dublin office.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What we’re looking for\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Creative coders, who can readily begin writing software in C++, Javascript or Python and have some familiarity with the thorny technical issues central to databases: distributed systems, consensus algorithms, data replication, query optimization, data storage, OS internals, concurrency and scheduling, networking, etc.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ideally we are looking for someone with 5+ years of experience in software development and/or performance engineering.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Purposeful learners, who seek understanding and try new approaches when they encounter roadblocks\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Past work may include: developing self-taught skills, becoming the go-to resource for a particular domain, or performing a root cause analysis on a support case\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Capable communicators, who can make complex concepts easy to grasp in written and spoken language\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Past work may include: writing technical documentation, producing trainings, or publishing academic papers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Scientific experimenters, who know how to decompose and solve complex problems and can rapidly iterate by validating new hypotheses and rethinking current assumptions\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Past work may include: designing and understanding complex systems, performing comparative benchmarking, or identifying the cause of an unexplained result\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you have other experiences that speak to these skills, please do not hesitate to apply. We are eager to build a diverse team that draws from a range of complementary experiences.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What we expect\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Increase our performance coverage by writing new macro-benchmarks, creating new workloads that stress the database and systems. Consult with developers to help them add performance tests for new features.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Investigate performance issues, and help undercover the root cause of an issue using internal tools as well as industry standards such as gdb and perf\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Curate an understanding of our performance coverage and clearly communicate the implications of changes in terms of user experience to stakeholders\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Consult with engineers developing new features and to help them produce the most valuable performance tests to benchmark new features\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;In 3 investigated performance issues using internal tools as well as tools like perf and gdb.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;In 6 test\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have a strong understanding of our performance framework and participate in roadmap discussions around new features to be added.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You can take an open-ended performance question from other teams, investigate it and provide actionable guidance\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;In 12 Months:\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have a strong understanding of our current At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Atlas is our database as a service offering and fastest growing product, allowing users to deploy fault-tolerant, secure, distributed MongoDB clusters in just minutes. Since becoming generally available in June 2022, Atlas Serverless has further simplified MongoDB deployment with minimal configuration, elastic scaling, and consumption-based pricing. The Atlas Serverless team is responsible for the core components of Atlas Serverless including load balancing, auto-scaling, multi-tenancy, consumption-based billing, security and performance.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join the Atlas Serverless Team. We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in New York, NY and interested in either our in-office or hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Role Responsibilities\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build MongoDB Atlas Serverless features using Java, C++, and JavaScript/TypeScript\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead and contribute to complex technical projects\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with product and design teams to incorporate user perspectives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Diagnose and fix issues alongside customers and support engineers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Coordinate with MongoDB server, driver, and other cloud engineers to make changes or contribute to their projects\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work with team members to improve our codebase, best practices, and design principles\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Learn from and mentor other team members\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Candidate Profile\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re looking for someone who:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Is proficient in a modern compiled programming language\u0026amp;nbsp; (C++, Java, C#, Go, etc.)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Has solid computer science fundamentals, with strong competencies in networking, distributed systems, and software design/architecture\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Has experience in building industrial-strength software projects with a large code base\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Has experience in programming, debugging, and performance tuning distributed and/or highly concurrent software systems\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Has excellent verbal and written technical communication skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Is enthusiastic about mentoring junior engineers and interns, aiding in their growth and development\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Is curious, collaborative, and intellectually honest. You are not afraid to admit you don’t know something or to ask for help\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Has a passion for low-level problem solving and learning new things in the domains of computer science and software engineering\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 3 months, you\u0026#39;ll have shipped code into production and collaborated with the team to solve tough problems\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 6 months, you’ll be responsible for reviewing code and have contributed to a large project\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In 12 months, you\u0026#39;ll have designed new features, led a project to completion, become a go-to expert on parts of the system and served as a mentor to junior engineers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for hardworking technologists to join our Pre-Sales organization to ensure that our growth is grounded and guided by strong technical alignment with our platform and the needs of our customers.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Pre-Sales Solution Architects are responsible for guiding our customers and users to craft and build reliable, scalable systems using our data platform. Our team is made up of hardworking software architects, entrepreneurs, and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success, including the design of their software, deployment, and operations. You\u0026#39;ll work closely with our cloud partner sales reps and play a key role in winning deals and driving the business forward. You\u0026#39;ll be a trusted advisor to a wide range of users from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help drive demand through participation in both industry-known trade-shows as well account-based marketing to support and mentor other pre-sales team members and share standard methodologies\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you will learn\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The rapidly growing MongoDB product suite, including\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Core database server\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Atlas (fully managed cloud database service)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Atlas Data Lake, Atlas Full-Text Search, Realm and Charts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Other Tools and connectors - Ops/Cloud Manager, Compass, Connector for BI, Connector for Spark\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Market-relevant, complementary technologies e.g. Apache Kafka, Kubernetes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Modern and popular architecture design patterns, methodologies and concerns e.g. microservices, DevOps, cloud, security\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Our life, accident insurance\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Pension contribution\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Travel allowance\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Education budget\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Employee assistance programs for mental health\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;We are looking for hardworking technologists to join our Pre-Sales organization to ensure that our growth is grounded and guided by strong technical alignment with our platform and the needs of our customers.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;MongoDB Pre-Sales Solution Architects are responsible for guiding our customers and users to craft and build reliable, scalable systems using our data platform. Our team is made up of hardworking software architects, entrepreneurs, and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success, including the design of their software, deployment, and operations. You\u0026#39;ll work closely with our sales reps and play a key role in winning deals and driving the business forward. You\u0026#39;ll be a trusted advisor to a wide range of users from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;If you\u0026#39;d like to learn more blog.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;This role will be based remotely in Mumbai(India).\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;As an ideal candidate, you will At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for hardworking technologists to join our Pre-Sales organization to ensure that our growth is grounded and guided by strong technical alignment with our platform and the needs of our customers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Pre-Sales Solution Architects are responsible for guiding our customers and users to craft and build reliable, scalable systems using our data platform. Our team is made up of hardworking software architects, entrepreneurs, and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success, including the design of their software, deployment, and operations. You\u0026#39;ll work closely with our sales reps and play a key role in winning deals and driving the business forward. You\u0026#39;ll be a trusted advisor to a wide range of users from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Canberra for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;As an ideal candidate, you will have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5+ years of customer facing technical experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years of pre-sales experience with enterprise software\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Solid understanding and ability to code with two or more modern scripting languages (e.g. Python, Node.js, SQL) and/or popular programming languages (e.g. C/C++, Java, C#)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with scalable and highly available distributed systems\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent presentation and interpersonal skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to travel up to 20%\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;You may also have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;2+ years of software development experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience selling databases and/or deploying applications with any of the major cloud providers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with database programming and data models\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A MongoDB Certification\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you do at MongoDB\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Design systems, applications, and infrastructure to help drive software development projects using MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Advise customers on architectures, patterns, and strategies for making the best use of MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Expertly articulate the business value of MongoDB solutions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Align to support sales with activities such as technical discovery, demos, proof of value, presentation, sizing, and documentation of technical decision criteria; working across a number of opportunities in parallel\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Translate technical concepts and patterns into business benefits for management and executives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Act as a liaison, collecting feedback from the field to relay back to the Product Management team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help drive demand through participation in both industry-known trade-shows as well account-based marketing events\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrate resilience and sound judgment in dealing with business challenges\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively seek opportunities to support and mentor other pre-sales team members and share standard methodologies\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you will learn\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The rapidly growing MongoDB product suite, including\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Core database server\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Atlas (fully managed cloud database service)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Atlas Data Lake, Atlas Full-Text Search, Realm and Charts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Other Tools and connectors - Ops/Cloud Manager, Compass, Connector for BI, Connector for Spark\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Market-relevant, complementary technologies e.g. Apache Kafka, Kubernetes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Modern and popular architecture design patterns, methodologies and concerns e.g. microservices, DevOps, cloud, security\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys.\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/blog/channel/culture\u0026quot;\u0026gt; Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, and help us make an impact on the world!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for hardworking technologists to join our Pre-Sales organization to ensure that our growth is grounded and guided by strong technical alignment with our platform and the needs of our customers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB Pre-Sales Solution Architects are responsible for guiding our customers and users to craft and build reliable, scalable systems using our data platform. Our team is made up of hardworking software architects, entrepreneurs, and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success, including the design of their software, deployment, and operations. You\u0026#39;ll work closely with our sales reps and play a key role in winning deals and driving the business forward. You\u0026#39;ll be a trusted advisor to a wide range of users from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based in Auckland or Wellington. You will be the first Pre-Sales architect on the ground in New Zealand, with a rare opportunity to grow and shape our New Zealand field organisation.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;As an ideal candidate, you will have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;5+ years of customer facing technical experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;3+ years of pre-sales experience with enterprise software\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Solid understanding and ability to code with two or more modern scripting languages (e.g. Python, Node.js, SQL) and/or popular programming languages (e.g. C/C++, Java, C#)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with scalable and highly available distributed systems\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent presentation and interpersonal skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to travel up to 20%\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;You may also have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;2+ years of software development experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience selling databases and/or deploying applications with any of the major cloud providers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with database programming and data models\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;A MongoDB Certification\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you do at MongoDB\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Design systems, applications, and infrastructure to help drive software development projects using MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Advise customers on architectures, patterns, and strategies for making the best use of MongoDB\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Expertly articulate the business value of MongoDB solutions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Align to support sales with activities such as technical discovery, demos, proof of value, presentation, sizing, and documentation of technical decision criteria; working across a number of opportunities in parallel\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Translate technical concepts and patterns into business benefits for management and executives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Act as a liaison, collecting feedback from the field to relay back to the Product Management team\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Help drive demand through participation in both industry-known trade-shows as well account-based marketing events\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrate resilience and sound judgment in dealing with business challenges\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Proactively seek opportunities to support and mentor other pre-sales team members and share standard methodologies\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;What you will learn\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The rapidly growing MongoDB product suite, including\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Core database server\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Atlas (fully managed cloud database service)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Atlas Data Lake, Atlas Full-Text Search, Realm and Charts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Other Tools and connectors - Ops/Cloud Manager, Compass, Connector for BI, Connector for Spark\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Market-relevant, complementary technologies e.g. Apache Kafka, Kubernetes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Modern and popular architecture design patterns, methodologies and concerns e.g. microservices, DevOps, cloud, security\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;In the Cloud API eXperience team we create delightful experiences that bring developers along on the journey from eager beginner to sophisticated MongoDB expert!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are part of the larger Cloud Services team, a diverse group of individuals who develop software to run MongoDB globally (see\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/cloud/atlas/\u0026quot;\u0026gt; MongoDB Atlas\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;). Our software and services allow users to deploy fault-tolerant, globally distributed MongoDB clusters in minutes.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As part of our team, you will work alongside engineers in the Cloud Services Team on drafting a modern technical design (including but not limited to authentication, documentation, testing, versioning) for our\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://docs.mongodb.com/cloud/\u0026quot;\u0026gt; REST APIs\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; and ensuring new and existing MongoDB users and developers have a best-in-class onboarding experience.\u0026amp;nbsp; You will also propose, design, and build (open-source) tools (e.g. \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://github.com/mongodb/mongocli\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;MongoDB Atlas CLI\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;) that achieve our mission.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking for talented and passionate engineers at all seniority levels who are self-driven and consistently work to grow their careers!\u0026amp;nbsp; We pride ourselves on our team\u0026#39;s culture and on being an inclusive and collaborative group of people who\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/careers\u0026quot;\u0026gt; Build Together\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;If you\u0026#39;re enthusiastic about technology and eager to develop your skills, we encourage you to apply, regardless of whether you meet all qualifications at the outset or have prior experience with MongoDB or Atlas. In our culture of continuous learning, we value your potential to adapt to and master new technologies. Join us, and seize the opportunity to grow and make a meaningful impact.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role will be based in our Dublin office.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Who are you?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You’re passionate about programming and technology! You enjoy working with others to achieve a common goal.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You possess strong collaboration skills. Your experience, whether as a member of a remote team or in collaboration with one, is a significant asset, given our Cloud Services Engineers are spread across various locations and time zones.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are an adept organizer. You possess the skills to efficiently evaluate priorities, coordinate your schedule, and take action on tasks sequentially, maintaining a balance that promotes productivity and quality in your work.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are highly proficient in your preferred mainstream programming language. While our work primarily involves Java 11 and Golang 1.20, we appreciate diverse language expertise.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have experience building multi-threaded, asynchronous, distributed systems.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are flexible, readily taking on a broad array of responsibilities and learning as you go. With your ability to think conceptually, you excel in designing and delivering sophisticated, modular systems.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have good knowledge of Computer Science fundamentals (Data structures and Algorithms) and Object Orientation concepts.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You have worked directly with production systems.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You are familiar with services running on cloud infrastructure (e.g. \u0026lt;em\u0026gt;Amazon AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure\u0026lt;/em\u0026gt;).\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What is in it for you?\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Generous compensation package (top-range salary, equity, comprehensive benefits)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Flexible working options (not a strict 9-6 role, focus on results, not the appearance of work)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You\u0026#39;ll be stepping into a culture of continuous learning. Our environment thrives on the exchange of knowledge, with ample opportunities to upskill in new technologies and develop professionally.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You can propose new and innovative ways to solve existing problems and code in more than one programming language.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will have a high level of independence in your day-to-day work.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You\u0026#39;ll be joining a good-humored encouraging team that deeply cares about its culture and wants to combine work and fun.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Upon joining every engineer will be provided with specialized in-depth training on the\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://university.mongodb.com/\u0026quot;\u0026gt; See below for more information about the specific teams\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Catalog and Routing:\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;The MongoDB Catalog and Routing team carries the important responsibility of hiding the complexity of building a distributed database system. They implement scalable interfaces with strong consistency guarantees which are used by other MongoDB developers to navigate and organize user data. As a result, their work has a direct impact on the productivity of the entire organization and the success of MongoDB’s horizontal scaling strategy.\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br\u0026gt;Recent work includes the addition of unpartitioned datasets to the catalog such that it can be balanced across multiple nodes without splitting a table’s keyspace, embedding cluster topology components to reduce the operational complexity of running a sharded cluster, and the ability to perform concurrent data definition operation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;API Experience \u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;As part of our team, you will be part of improving our users experience of working with the\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://docs.mongodb.com/cloud/\u0026quot;\u0026gt; Atlas Administrative API\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;. You will propose, design and build a part of the API platform, ensuring MongoDB users and developers have a best-in-class experience. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team to help us \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/company\u0026quot;\u0026gt;‘Think Big, Go Far’\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; this summer!\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We’re seeking curious minds like yours to collaborate with full-time engineers, learning standard development methodologies and gaining practical software engineering experience. Interns are fully integrated software engineers who spend the summer pushing production-level code to make lasting contributions to our products.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What we are looking for in you\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In the process of receiving a Bachelor’s or Master\u0026#39;s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related fields\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Have a foundation in computer science theory, with proficiencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fluent in any one of the following programming languages: Java, Python, Go, C++, Javascript, Node.js - or a comparable object-oriented programming language\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Due to complete studies in 2025\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;About our teams\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our opportunities in Dublin are on our Kubernetes, API Experience, Query or Server Performance teams. See below for more information about the specific teams\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Kubernetes\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; Kubernetes is steadily becoming the de-facto platform of choice for running applications and workloads, allowing highly automated management of containerized workloads in a declarative way. As part of the Kubernetes team, you will be working on one of our three Kubernetes operators, two of which are open source: \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://github.com/mongodb/mongodb-kubernetes-operator\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Community Operator\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://github.com/mongodb/mongodb-enterprise-kubernetes\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Enterprise Operator\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; and the \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://github.com/mongodb/mongodb-atlas-kubernetes\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Atlas Operator\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;. We aspire to closely monitor and align with the cloud native movement. Our operators represent an additional automation layer on top of Kubernetes to enable customers to deploy highly resilient and scalable MongoDB instances in a standardized, stable and DevOps-enabled Kubernetes environment, irrespective of whether it runs in the cloud or on-premises. We are always looking for people with keen interest in a cloud computing career and eager to learn about modern DevOps, Cloud Native, Golang and Docker.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;API Experience \u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;As part of our team, you will be part of improving our users experience of working with the\u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://docs.mongodb.com/cloud/\u0026quot;\u0026gt; Atlas Administrative API\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;. You will propose, design and build a part of the API platform, ensuring MongoDB users and developers have a best-in-class experience. You will also have the opportunity to write open-source software such as \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://github.com/mongodb/mongocli\u0026quot;\u0026gt;AtlasCLI\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://github.com/mongodb/mongodbatlas-cloudformation-resources\u0026quot;\u0026gt;MongoDB Atlas Cloud Formation Resources\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://github.com/mongodb/terraform-provider-mongodbatlas\u0026quot;\u0026gt;MongoDB Atlas Terraform Provider\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; \u0026amp;amp; \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://github.com/mongodb/go-client-mongodb-atlas\u0026quot;\u0026gt;MongoDB Atlas Go SDK\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;, which helps us provide a \u0026quot;wow\u0026quot; experience to our customers by reducing the cognitive load required to get started on MongoDB Atlas \u0026amp;amp; allow them to easily integrate their applications.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Query \u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;The Query Team is responsible for MongoDB\u0026#39;s unique query system, the beating heart of the entire MongoDB server. We take user requests and generate optimized query plans for lightning-fast data retrieval and transformation; we build MongoDB\u0026#39;s real-time \u0026quot;change stream\u0026quot; event notification framework; we write the distributed code that targets and merges data across a MongoDB cluster. Right now we\u0026#39;re in the middle of a historic rewrite of these core systems to make MongoDB an even better fit for the emerging time series and data analytics spaces, and we\u0026#39;re looking for a few adventurous interns to help us make it even better. If that sounds like you, then we\u0026#39;d love to have you come on board as a member of our Class of 2024\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Server Performance \u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;We drive performance improvements for MongoDB products. As a result, customers get more predictable, scalable and efficient applications. The database is the beating heart of all software applications. If you want to see the big picture and experience a broad range of technologies from processors, storage \u0026amp;amp; networks to code/compilers and cloud-based globally distributed systems - this is the role for you. Previous projects our team has worked on include\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Working with cloud platform companies to evaluate new technologies and optimize MongoDB performance on them - for example reducing carbon footprint\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Comparing and analyzing MongoDB performance with other databases\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Optimizing our suite of benchmarks for continuous integration\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Performance tuning new features before release\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Tuning and simulating customer workloads\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;What you\u0026#39;ll find at MongoDB\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The opportunity to work in our Dublin office\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Authentic Culture: A workplace where you are encouraged to bring your whole self to work, we believe that Embracing the Power of Differences is the best way to broaden our own perspectives and foster innovation.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Personalized Mentorship: Pair up with an engineering Mentor, a Program Advisor from the Early Talent Recruitment Team, and an \u0026lt;a href=\u0026quot;https://www.mongodb.com/careers/diversity-and-inclusion\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Employee Resource Group\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; with access to mental health benefits, paid time off, free lunch, and more!\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Impactful Projects: Contribute to projects where you can Make it Matter - your meaningful work will see the light of day.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Exclusive Networking: Attend \u0026quot;Speaker Series\u0026quot; We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;We are looking for hardworking technologists to join our Pre-Sales organization to ensure that our growth is grounded and guided by strong technical alignment with our platform and the needs of our customers.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;MongoDB Pre-Sales Solution Architects are responsible for guiding our customers and users to craft and build reliable, scalable systems using our data platform. Our team is made up of hardworking software architects, entrepreneurs, and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success, including the design of their software, deployment, and operations. You\u0026#39;ll work closely with our sales reps and play a key role in winning deals and driving the business forward. You\u0026#39;ll be a trusted advisor to a wide range of users from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;If you\u0026#39;d like to learn more Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;We are looking for hardworking technologists to join our Pre-Sales organization to ensure that our growth is grounded and guided by strong technical alignment with our platform and the needs of our customers.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;MongoDB Pre-Sales Solution Architects are responsible for guiding our customers and users to craft and build reliable, scalable systems using our data platform. Our team is made up of hardworking software architects, entrepreneurs, and developers who take direct responsibility for customer success, including the design of their software, deployment, and operations. You\u0026#39;ll work closely with our sales reps and play a key role in winning deals and driving the business forward. You\u0026#39;ll be a trusted advisor to a wide range of users from startups to the world\u0026#39;s largest enterprise IT organizations.\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;This role will be based remotely in any of the following cities: Berlin, Frankfurt, Hamburg or Munich\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;As an ideal candidate, you will have\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;5+ years of software development experience\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Solid understanding and ability to code with two or more modern scripting languages (e.g. Python, Node.js, SQL) and/or popular programming languages (e.g. C/C++, Java, C#)\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Excellent presentation and interpersonal skills\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;A Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;Fluent in German\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\u0026quot;\u0026gt;The ability to travel up to 20%\u0026lt;/span\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;\u0026lt;span style=\u0026quot;font-weight: At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Business Value Consulting (BVC) is a critical, client-facing role where the consultant will work closely with the MongoDB Sales team, playing a key role in driving the business forward. In a pre-sales perspective, BVCs engage with clients to capture and communicate the potential business value that our solutions provide. For post-Sales, BVCs validate the value, identify optimization opportunities and identify new growth opportunities. You will work across all industries, evaluating the business benefits and financial value to companies primarily in our Enterprise market.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in\u0026amp;nbsp;Gurugram\u0026amp;nbsp;for our hybrid working model\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;.\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Responsibilities\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Support the sales organization, to impact both tactical and strategic opportunity success of our field sales force\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Develop Business Value Consulting collateral for internal and external use: when new MongoDB products are released, and when a gap or need of the practice is identified\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Serve as a mentor to sellers who may be unfamiliar with this role, and further improve the value selling capabilities of the rest\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Engage with customers using a value-based selling approach to build a compelling narrative that covers the current state, the desired future state, the value in closing the gap, and a delivery plan to ensure their success\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Consult with existing customers in Value Realization activities to ensure they understand the value achieved, improvement opportunities and new value opportunities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Use business, technical, and financial analyses to understand the baseline and future state capabilities of the customer\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Create and present the business case and the forecasted business impact the customer can achieve using MongoDB solutions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Translate technical concepts and recommendations into business benefits for management and executives\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Innovate new value propositions, playbooks and BVC strategy\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lead innovation initiatives across through researching, prototyping and integrating predictive solutions into systems across the company.\u0026amp;nbsp; We are growing adoption of data science models across the business, and you will help us increase this velocity substantially.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As a senior technical member of the centralized Data Science team, this role will have key externally- and internally-facing leadership responsibilities, including:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Working with many stakeholders across different verticals, navigating the metrics.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Leveraging and continuing to grow your experience in elevating a Data Science team’s capabilities through technical and business-savvy mentorship.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;em\u0026gt;Note: we are looking for candidates expressly able to work during Eastern Time Zone business hours, but As businesses evolve their application development frameworks, they\u0026#39;re increasingly drawn to the versatility of the document model. The Relational Migrator team, already instrumental in this area, aids developers in making the shift from relational databases to MongoDB. Now, they\u0026#39;re broadening their toolkit and are keen on refining code using a mix of AI and traditional text processing.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;MongoDB is seeking a Staff Software Engineer with advanced expertise in software engineering skills and a machine learning background. Joining this team, you\u0026#39;ll be pivotal in a product engineering group dedicated to helping users navigate code conversion challenges with AI\u0026#39;s support.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Sydney for our hybrid working model.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;The ideal candidate for this role will have\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;8+ years of professional software development experience, with a demonstrated ability to take on more profound technical challenges and provide thought leadership in the domain.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Extensive experience in Java or another primary programming language, with a deep understanding of the language\u0026#39;s intricacies and best practices\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with generative AI and specifically LLMs is highly desirable\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Knowledge of software engineering principles, system design, data engineering, and cloud architecture\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Hands-on experience with sophisticated text processing engines such as ANTLR and understanding its underlying principles\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Comprehensive knowledge of compiler design, code parsing, or related disciplines. Familiarity with core concepts such as abstract syntax trees (AST), lexical analysis, and syntax analysis\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Curiosity, a positive attitude, and a drive to continue learning\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Actively engages in emerging trends and research relevant to product features\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Excellent verbal and written communication skills\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Execute a comprehensive code modernisation strategy that aligns transitioned code with cutting-edge practices\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Design and optimise sophisticated code parsers to At MongoDB, we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The MongoDB Replicated Storage Services Team is hiring a staff engineer focused on tuning and improving the performance of the replication and storage layers. The replicated storage subsystem sits at the heart of the database, and the team is working to build a performant transaction processing engine to power our customers\u0026#39; many use cases.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of one of our North American offices, or remotely in North America.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Candidate Profile\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;8+ years of experience in measuring, tuning and improving the performance of systems software\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience using performance analysis tools, like Linux perf, callgrind, cachegrind, VTune or similar\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Hands-on experience building performance-sensitive software\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Solid computer science fundamentals, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design/architecture\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with large backend/compiled code bases, preferably in C++, C or Rust\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;B.Sc. in Computer Science or similar field, or equivalent practical experience\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Interest in the theory and practice of high availability systems and storage engines. Hands-on experience or M.Sc./Ph.D in the domain is a plus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Position Expectations\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Understand and improve the performance of the MongoDB replicated storage engine\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Contribute high quality C++ code and give and solicit feedback in code reviews\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Identify, design, implement, test, and support new features related to storage and replication performance and robustness, as well as contribute to reviewing our architecture to ensure future performance scalability\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work constructively with peers to deliver excellent technical solutions\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Success Measures\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In three months you’ll have contributed to the development of a project slated for the next major version and investigated performance issues independently\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In six months, you’ll have taken on code review responsibilities and are independently contributing to meaningful performance improvements\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In twelve months, you’re contributing to the design of major architectural improvements that drive forward better performance of the replication and storage layers of the database\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading developer data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Join and be a part of leading the MongoDB Service Architecture team, helping build the core of a distributed database! Our team focuses on creating and enhancing components which facilitate communication all within a single process, between cooperating distributed processes, and between the database and the operating system. Service Architecture’s responsibilities include, but are not limited to, maintaining MongoDB networking and command dispatch systems, improving the programming model, and building low level reusable software components that can be leveraged by other teams working on the database.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our team currently consists of twelve engineers, half located in New York City and half fully remote. We operate close to the bottom of the stack, and have a lot of influence over the performance and robustness of our open source database as well as the development efficiency of the engineering team overall. Recently we’ve worked on testing the performance of various memory allocators, introducing a new networking stack, and thinking about cluster workload management to better handle our customers at scale.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Are you excited to help the MongoDB engineering team build a better database? We are! Join us today, and we can build a faster, more reliable, exceptionally observable, database system together.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Note: This role can be based out of our NYC office At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This role can be based out of our New York City office or remotely in North America. East coast is preferred.Responsibilities\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In this role, you will be a key leader in the MongoDB security product management team with core responsibilities for encryption in-use, encryption-in-transit, and encryption-at-rest across our Queryable Encryption, Field-level Encryption, and Atlas products.\u0026amp;nbsp;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;You will also have additional product responsibilities in the security space.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Drive product vision, strategy, and roadmap. Collaborate with other product teams to identify and prioritize efforts based on customer needs, market data, and competitive intelligence.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Deeply understand all aspects of the business - to ensure a business outcome aligned with our broader product, customer, and company goals.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Actively maintain a view of how the market, competition, and technologies are evolving, and factor them into our product direction.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Advise senior leadership on the long-term emerging opportunities in the data encryption, data privacy, and data integrity space.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Collaborate with product marketing, support, and sales to solve business limiters within your control and pursue key business accelerants.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Articulate MongoDB’s security features and functionality in customer conversations.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demonstrate creativity, an innovative spirit, and a bias towards action.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;h3\u0026gt;Requirements\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;10+ years of product management or equivalent experience with encryption or deep data security.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience working with security focused engineers in a diverse team.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Hands-on experience with some of these: AWS KMS, Azure Key Vault, GCP KMS, KMIP\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to demonstrate our in-use encryption capabilities via demo programs.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Some experience with AWS, Azure, and GCP authentication or authorization mechanisms.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Some understanding of performance in a database context.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;The ability to drive complex projects across
